Required:I Alone Am The Honored One\! (Jujutsu Kaisen)  
Your control and handling of cursed energy is truly perfect, even better than a user of the Six Eyes. You have mastered each and every jujutsu ability the world has to offer, simple domains, barriers, shikigami, and even newer techniques such as falling blossom emotion and the new shadow style. Your ability to utilize and direct cursed energy is without equal and you can cook up new techniques and abilities using cursed energy as easily as merely conceptualizing them. Though mastering and utilizing them efficiently is another matter, though not one you need to concern yourself with for long, as your talent at mastering anything curse-related is truly insane.

Furthermore, your already unreal amount of cursed energy has skyrocketed and more than doubled, it may grow even further if you choose to consume the cursed spirit haunting you and take its power for yourself. After all, as the King of Curses, you need not rely on anyone, but yourself.  
*Ultimate Cut*  
Required:The Sanctioned Action (K6BD)  
The ability to cut anything, truly anything, is now yours.

Your comprehension of the Sanctioned Action and your innate technique have formed a truly monstrous power.  
Concepts, time, space, laws of reality, you can cut it all. Your Cleave and Dismantle has assimilated into one technique, Cut. Cut allows you to cut anything you can perceive or conceptualize. It has no travel time or physical form, what you attack with it is simply instantly cut in whichever way you want it to. The efficiency of Cut is so great that even if you continually use it for days on end you still wouldn't run out of cursed energy, and that is with an average reserve of cursed energy.

To Stand Over Heaven (JJBA)  
Cost: 30 SP  
Required:Stand (JJBA)  
After rigorous training and unlocking the full potential of your Stand, you have achieved the extraordinary ability known as "To Stand Over Heaven." With this upgrade, you can access any canon Stand from the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure universe, with the exceptions of "The World Over Heaven" and "Made in Heaven." Initially, you can switch to any canon Stand, but you are limited to using one Stand at a time.

As you progress and grow in power, you will gain the capability to wield multiple Stands simultaneously. This newfound proficiency allows you to combine a diverse array of Stand abilities, making you a more formidable force on the battlefield. The fusion of different Stand powers grants you unparalleled versatility, enabling you to adapt to any situation and overcome challenges.

However, the ultimate pinnacle of your power lies in mastering Requiem and Stand Combination. With time and experience, you will acquire the ability to access the Requiem form of any Stand you are using temporarily, significantly enhancing its power and capabilities, however, through training you will be able to use the Requiem form of any Stand permanently. And through Stand Combination, you can merge multiple Stands into one, amplifying their power and creating an awe-inspiring Stand known as "The One Above Heaven."

Nonetheless, attaining such extraordinary heights comes with great risks. The power of Stand combination is a double-edged sword, and you must tread carefully to prevent being overwhelmed by the sheer force of this amalgamation. While "The One Above Heaven" grants you unparalleled might, it also demands immense control and focus to prevent the power from consuming you. To access "The World Over Heaven" and "Made in Heaven", you will need to undergo specific rituals or go through intense training to unlock their potential.  
*Heaven Ascension*  
Required:THE Ultimate Lifeform (JJBA)  
As the Ultimate Lifeform, the apex of all living beings, your mastery over your Stand has evolved to unprecedented heights, reaching a level no one ever has. This newfound power, known as "Heaven Ascension" grants you access to every single stand from JJBA, including "The World Over Heaven", "Made in Heaven", and even Stands from alternative universes like JORGE JOESTAR, alongside making all your Stands reach their Ultimate versions, significantly enhancing their abilities.

As The Ultimate Lifeform, you can now effortlessly transform your Stand into its Requiem mode whenever you desire, and maintain this state for as long as you wish. Moreover, combining Stands has become much easier, allowing you to merge more stands and their powers seamlessly.

Not only that, you've gained the ability to create entirely new Stands over time, including new variations of stand types like Wounds, Bounds, and Beyonds. Even more astonishingly, you can now bestow Stands upon others simply by touching them.

Your power of "Understanding" has been greatly enhanced, enabling you to instantly comprehend and master even the most foreign or esoteric concepts effortlessly. With a single glance, even the most unique or rare abilities can be comprehended by you now.

Shun Shun Rikka (Bleach)  
Cost: 35 SP  
Required:Reiryoku (Bleach)  
Shun Shun Rikka is composed of six spirits that you can instantly summon and dismiss, and which reside within a six petal flower-shaped hairpins, each of which is two petals on the clip when inactive, and only spiritually aware beings can see them. Through various combinations of the six fairies, you have the power to reject phenomena by denying or undoing events in various forms. This power can be used for attack, defense, or healing (depending on the combination), and if used to its full capabilities can rival gods.  
The spirits are separate manifestations of your own soul, each with its own unique appearance and personality.  
Two spirits (Ayame, and Shun'ō) are in charge of healing. They surround something to return it to its former, complete state, by rejecting, reversing, and reconstructing phenomena that have occurred, even phenomena that you haven't witnessed. You can even fully resurrect the dead with this.  
The other Three spirits (Hinagiku, Baigon, and Lily) are in charge of defense. By placing a shield of any size between the enemy and target, that can repel all forms of attacks. This shield is impenetrable because of its event rejection nature.  
The last spirit Tsubaki is in charge of offense. It can cut through basically anything, by rejecting the fusion of something, and repelling it, splitting it in two.  
You can also combine the offensive and defensive spirits together, to create a shield that can disperse the incoming attack, and then reflect it back at full force towards the assailant. The full extent of this power can only be explored by you.  
These spirits exhibit unwavering loyalty solely to you, dedicating themselves to serving you to the best of their abilities. When subjected to damage, the fairies can transform back into their hairpin form, undergoing passive regeneration with a maximum recovery time of 24 hours.  
As long as your soul endures, the hairpins remain indestructible.

Book of the End (Bleach)  
Cost: 15 SP  
Required:Fullbringer (Bleach)  
You gain access to the Fullbring of Shūkurō Tsukishima, which you can summon and dismiss freely in both its bookmark and sword forms. As a katana, it can be used as a high-quality weapon comparable to a Zanpakutō with incredible sharpness. But its real power lies in its ability to manipulate the past.

Whenever the user chooses to activate the sword's power, it will manipulate the targeted object’s or being’s past by inserting the user into its history, with the option to prevent the blade from actually harming your target in the traditional way. This would allow you to cut the ground and insert yourself into its history, laying a trap in the location, repair an object by changing its history in a way you prevented it from breaking in the first place, or make yourself the childhood friend of your enemy, making them hesitate. You also gain a comprehensive knowledge of the altered history you insert into others', giving you the capability to obtain an immense amount of knowledge and skills in an instant.  
This will also synergize with your other powers exceptionally well, as you will always have access to your full capabilities as you insert yourself into the past, which can be used creatively. For example, you could cut your homework to have it done by yesterday, cut a flask of water, changing its past to be an elixir you brewed via alchemy, or change the history of somebody by making them have a magical contract, forcing them to be your familiar.

The only real weakness of the Fullbring is the fact that its rewriting of history only affects your direct target(s), so if you are not careful, other people can recognise inconsistencies like you inserting yourself into your target’s history by hanging out with them but then others pointing out you were in fact at work that day.

Finally, your Fullbring is attached to your soul on a conceptual level, which allows it to grow in power just like any normal power you get here, and it can slowly recover in its unsummoned state if it gets damaged or broken.

Required:Michibane (Bleach)

This allows your history altering to spread out from your target, granting you the capability of truly rewriting history on a grand scale. But using this will increase the cost of spiritual power with every extra affected person and/or object, making its cost scale with the scale of your history editing.

You will always retain all of the powers and perks you obtained here, on top of whatever you gain from your new bloodline. This ability has an immense spiritual power cost, possibly even knocking out the user from exhaustion.  
*Universal Bookmark*  
Required:Alibi Block (Medaka Box)  
Now, you can apply Alibi Block to the past of anyone you've cut, enabling you to physically travel back in time and appear in their past. You will leave behind an instinctual bookmark in the “present” allowing you to instantly reappear whenever you want in the original timeline, which is now changed by whatever you did.

Alongside this something else has happened, you’ve no longer inherited that of those that bare the name Ōtsutsuki and their incarnations, you seemed to have inherited the combined physical ability, chakra, skill, wisdom, talent, jutsu, and knowledge of every single descendant of Kaguya. You’ve also gained the ability to implant Kama’s into others to help avoid death, although yours are special as there will never be any incompatibility with any hosts you possess, and you can freely choose whether your hosts will obtain a White Kama or a true one. Your hosts cannot use the power gifted by the Kama against you, nor can they access unless you wish for them to be able to. When you reincarnate you other hosts will not lose their Kamas.

Shibai Ōtsutsuki (Naruto)  
Cost: 10 SP  
Required:Chakra Fruit (Naruto)  
Required:Hagoromo (Naruto)  
Required:Tenseigan (Naruto)  
You’ve grown and grown, travelled thousands of worlds, cultivated and consumed countless chakra fruits until you’ve finally achieved what every Ōtsutsuki chases, Godhood. Your chakra is now on a scale none could dare have imagined, they are now divine miracles itself. You possess various remarkable abilities such as clairvoyance and automatic reflection of all harm to yourself. You no longer need a physical form and may freely discard your body and ascend to higher realms if you wish, you exist as a chakra being for all intents and purposes and hold a body only when you desire. Alongside this, all your dōjutsu have merged into a single one, the Jōgan. This power, while supremely powerful, only grants three abilities. You may still freely access your lower level dōjustu, and all of their abilities carry over to the Jōgan.

Zengo, with this ability the Jōgan grants absolute perception and complete comprehension of all things. From the barriers between dimensions, to the interactions of particles so small and so fast they could be said to have not happened at all, to even peering into the Pure Lands themselves.  
Zenjiyuu, with this ability the Jōgan grants it’s wielder true and absolute freedom. It removes all limitations and constraints. Your chakra no longer has to be mixed, controlled, altered or anything. It is not constrained by amount, potency, or type; it simply does what you wish for it to do. You are unbounded by any limits, whether they be physical or mental. You are free to move, think, and act as you please without fear of any kind of restriction or confinement. You can float effortlessly above the ground or race along at superhuman speed. Your mind is limitless, with capacity for analytical reasoning, imagination and creativity beyond human understanding. You can penetrate any mind or shield, gaining knowledge and insight that might otherwise be impossible for mere mortals. Your very form is free to change whenever you wish, capable of swapping its natures and properties whenever you wish. Even universal laws of physics, time and space hold no power over you, for you are truly free if you wish to escape those constraints.  
Zennō, and with this final ability the Jōgan grants you the ability to rewrite reality itself. You’ve now the ability to alter everything around you as you wish, capable of writing whole worlds into existence if you choose. With this power, fantasy is as real and permanent as reality, and reality is as imaginary and ephemeral as fantasy.

Indra (Naruto)  
Cost: 5 SP  
Required:Hokage (Naruto)  
Required:Eternal Mangekyō Sharingan (Naruto)  
You're not merely the amalgamation of every Hokage, no, you’re also the latest and most powerful Incarnation of the Uchiha progenitor Indra Ōtsutsuki himself. You’ve gained all the combined physical ability, chakra, skill, wisdom, talent, jutsu, and knowledge of every single incarnation of Indra that has existed. Indra was known for excelling at everything he tried, a genius of caliber almost unseen. You now possess this talent and can with almost contemptuous ease learn and develop anything you wish. As the creator of Ninjutsu himself, you’ve gained enormous talent and genius with jutsu in particular. Creating a new jutsu is now as simple for you as it is for a normal man to construct a sentence. Your chakra quality and potency is doubled and your chakra control is perfect. All your Dōjutsu are further amplified by an order of magnitude.

Asura (Naruto)  
Cost: 6 SP  
Required:Hokage (Naruto)  
Required:Senju (Naruto)  
Required:Uzumaki (Naruto)  
It seems there is a bit of irony here, as just like some of your predecessors were, you yourself are an incarnation of the Sage’s second son Asura. But it seems even for an incarnation of Asura you are special. You have not simply inherited his talent, chakra and will like others, no, you have inherited everything from both Asura and every incarnation after him. Asura inherited his father’s incredibly powerful body and chakra. While his brother was a solitary man, Asura was known to gain followers and comrades by the droves. Likewise his brother’s bloodline spawned only the ever powerful Uchiha clan, Asura spread and created several. From his most powerful bloodlines the Uzumaki and Senju, to lesser known clans such as the Kaguya, or even Jūgo’s now near extinct clan, every chakra nature and body based bloodline can eventually trace their lineage back to Asura. Aside from greatly amplifying your previous abilities, you now possess the ability to instinctively wield and mix all chakra natures and can freely modify your body as you wish. Weaponize your blood and bones, utilize lava and wood to alter the battlefield, or freely manipulate your chakra’s shape and inherent properties at will. You’ve also gained the ability to enter a powerful chakra form and can manifest a chakra avatar on par with Indra’s Susanoo.

Six Paths Senjutsu (Naruto)  
Cost: 15 SP  
Required:Sage Mode (Naruto)  
Your Sage Mode has been improved through fusing with Otsutsuki DNA, granting you access to Six Paths Senjutsu, Truth-seeking Balls, Six Paths Chakra, all major Otsutsuki Kekkei Genkai and Kekkei Mora, and a mental encyclopedia of all ninshu (as well as it's descendants, ninjutsu, taijutsu, & genjutsu) and shinjutsu, although you still have to learn how to use them.  
You have also been granted a truly immense reserve of chakra surpassing even EOS Naruto though not by that much, have enough strength to uproot an entire God Tree with a single physical attack, enough speed to appear as if you teleported a kilometer and a half away, the reaction speed to dodge light beams, and enough resilience/regeneration to survive being cut in half and regenerate from it.

*Chakra Ancestor*  
Required:Chakra Fruit (Naruto)  
Due to the consumption of the chakra fruit, you have now evolved and achieved a whole new level of power never seen before. Your chakra reserves are enhanced to a monstrous level, matching and surpassing an entire planet’s worth of chakra, blowing even Madara's chakra reserve when he became the Juubi’s Jinchūriki out of the water, meaning that you can wipe out countries and continents easily, and if pushed can destroy a planet with your chakra techniques. You now have access to every Kekkei Genkai and Mora in the show or manga, and can create your own.  
Your physical stats have risen insanely, such that your punches with no chakra enchantment could easily wipe out countries and subcontinents, while you can withstand planet destroying attacks and your movement speed/reaction speed is comparable to light.  
You can choose to keep your normal appearance, maybe with horns or pure white skin if you want, or gain a similar demonic-like form gained by both Momoshiki and Urashiki  
.  
*Banbutsu*  
Required:Rinnegan (Naruto)  
With the addition of the Rinnegan you’ve unlocked and mastered three incredibly powerful Onmyōton techniques, one of which the very Sage of Six Paths used to create the Bijū.

The first technique is Banbutsu Sōzō, Creation of All Things. Through this you have the ability to turn fantasy into reality. By utilizing Yin to shape and form your imagination into being and then utilizing your Yang chakra to bring it from fantasy into reality.  
The second technique is Banbutsu Shōkyo, Eradication of All Things. Through this you have the ability to turn reality to fantasy. By utilizing Yang to take control of an existing thing and then converting it into Yin you can erase anything from existence that your chakra can get ahold of.  
The third and final technique is Banbutsu Henkō, Modification of All Things. By applying both above techniques, one has the ability to modify any existing thing their chakra can get a hold of. By utilizing Yang to take control of an existing thing and then converting it into Yin to reshape and reform from your imagination then back into Yang to bring it back into physical form.

Sage Mode (Naruto)  
Cost: 10 SP  
Required:Chakra (Naruto)  
You have acquired the ability to use Senjutsu, a specialized field of jutsu that involves harnessing the natural energy that exists in the world and merging it with your own chakra. While most people who attempt this risk turning to stone or transforming into an animal, you have complete control over your Nature Chakra, preventing these drawbacks.  
Once you gather enough natural energy and merge it with your chakra, you enter Sage Mode. In this form, your physical strength, speed, stamina, reflexes, perception, and durability are greatly enhanced. For example, in Sage Mode, you could lift a house-sized rhino and hurl it over your head nearly a hundred feet into the air. Weapons made of iron or steel that would normally pierce your body like butter would shatter against your skin. Enemies who could once track your movements will now struggle as you effortlessly outmaneuver them.  
Sage Mode also enhances your ninjutsu and genjutsu, while allowing you to amplify your taijutsu with nature energy, enabling unique and powerful attacks. Additionally, if you couldn't previously sense the life force of enemies, you now can, allowing you to detect attacks without needing to see them.  
If you face an enemy capable of draining chakra, they are likely to die by turning to stone, as your control over Nature Chakra does not extend to them.  
While most practitioners of Senjutsu need to remain still and meditate for minutes or even hours to gather chakra, you can simply clasp your hands together and gather enough natural energy to power your Sage Mode for an hour in just seconds.  
*One with Nature*  
Required: Nature Magic (Warcraft), or Street Druid  
Your internal pool of natural energy allows you to do what was previously thought impossible and become the perfect Sage. Due to your natural energy being sourced from yourself like your physical and spiritual energies, all your Chakra will naturally transform into Senjutsu Chakra, allowing you to enter Sage Mode indefinitely. You will naturally be in Sage Mode by default, but draining your natural energy too quickly can result in you being knocked out of it. You also receive additional benefits due to converting your Natural Techniques into Sage Techniques.  
If you have Nature Magic, then your druidic shapeshifting gives you access to the sage transformation of Jugo’s clan. This enhances your physical capabilities while allowing you to transform your appendages into various weapons and other such transformations like those displayed by users of Orochimaru’s cursed seals.  
If you have Street Druid, then your ability to commune with nature allows you to learn all its techniques. This enhances your spiritual capabilities, allowing you to create new techniques based on any of nature’s animals. This allows you to create new paths on the road to Sagehood that may one day rival the ways of the snakes, slugs, and toads.  
If you have Keeper of the Grove, you will become the greatest Senjutsu Master the world has ever known.  
*One with the World*  
Required:Senjutsu (DxD)  
Your skill and talent with Senjutsu from the World of DXD have given you the ability to overcome Sage Mode's weaknesses.  
Notably, you don't need to stay still and meditate allowing you to draw in natural energy with less effort.  
You can purify the land around you, improving the natural energy quality you draw upon yourself by an immense degree.  
Examples include having the strength to lift and throw Tailed Beasts with little effort and strong enough to smash holes in mountains from the sheer force of your strikes.  
Any techniques you use whether through Chakra or DXD Senjutsu also gain a significant increase in power.

Uzumaki (Naruto)  
Cost: 15 SP  
Required:Chakra (Naruto)  
It seems you possess the blood of the Uzumaki, a now decimated but once proud and enigmatic clan descended from Asura himself. The Uzumaki were provided incredible abilities through their bloodline of which you have also inherited, but you are no mere member of the clan. Instead you're a paragon of the Uzumaki, their equivalent of Hashirama to the Senju, or Madara to the Uchiha.  
You now possess a much more powerful body and life force, granting you effective immortality and regeneration on par with Madara’s after he absorbed the Jūbi, and your chakra capacity and quality has been increased by a factor of 4\.  
Your chakra has also gained certain properties alongside it, now a lot more dense you can manifest your pure chakra as constructs and you can now channel any unique properties your chakra possess. You start off with the skill and mastery of utilizing your chakra constructs as chains but are by no means limited to it.  
Alongside the potency of your chakra, the Uzumaki were known to possess unique qualities within their chakra, such as Karin’s healing, Kushina’s ability to absorb and bind, and more. You can freely modify your chakra properties such as absorbing others chakra or being poisonous at will. You can learn over time to hold multiple chakra properties at once but are only capable of imbuing it with one property to start with.  
And now finally the Uzumaki’s greatest skill, the one ability which caused other nations fear them so that they banded together to destroy them, Fuinjutsu. Seals are a unique conundrum in the Shinobi world, do they merely store things or can they do everything just in written form? For you it is very much the latter, you are now capable of with time, research, and practice, capable of doing anything with seals. You have the innate ability to understand the nature and language of seals, able to decipher, read, and write in it as easily as breathing. You start off knowing how to replicate any effect you can produce, whether through your body, powers, chakra or anything else but you can do so much more. You can do anything you put a modicum of effort to.

Senju (Naruto)  
Cost: 15 SP  
Required:Chakra (Naruto)  
You now possess the esteemed lineage of the Senju clan, renowned for their exceptional life force and immense physical and mental energy.  
This bloodline bestows upon you a range of attributes. Firstly, you inherit a potent life force that manifests as remarkable stamina, overall vitality and physical strength, you no longer need to use hand seals for all but the most advanced techniques, and you gain the regenerative abilities of Hashirama Senju (the accelerated cell growth of which neither shortens your lifespan nor gives you cancer, even enhancing your lifespan by lengthening your telomeres when they shorten). Additionally, you experience a heightened capacity for acquiring or creating new techniques, and possess formidable reserves of chakra, equal to that of a mature Jinchūriki. But most notably, you inherit the profound power of Wood Release, an art formed by the harmonious fusion of Water and Earth elements. This sacred technique enables you to breathe life into existence using your own energy, primarily in the form of wood and other botanical creations.  
Wood Release excels in almost all situations. You can summon solid wooden barriers to fend off attacks, ensnare adversaries with roots and branches to catch them off guard, and generate fields of fruit that emit poisonous gases capable of explosive impact beneath the enemy's feet, your imagination sets the boundaries as you can craft colossal wooden constructs, rivaling the size of mountains.  
Remarkably durable, your wood surpasses the strength of tungsten-steel alloys and possesses the unique ability to absorb life energy from anything it ensnares, should you desire it.

Ultra Ego (Dragon Ball Series)  
Cost: 20 SP  
Required:God Ki (Dragon Ball Series)  
This state is attained by one who has received a proper God of Destruction training and has gained the ability to use the powers of one.  
When the Ultra Ego transformation is in use, the user becomes exponentially more powerful than before and gains the ability to use Power of Destruction in full. The user's aura can also be manifested in an opaque, flame-like state which can destroy enemy attacks on contact. In contrast to Ultra Instinct, which draws upon the principles of conquering oneself, while Ultra Ego seems to draw upon a severe level of self-indulgence in battle. Whereas Ultra Instinct allows a user's efficiency and power to increase as they continue to evade and counterattack, Ultra Ego allows the user's overall power to increase as they take more damage and delve more into their lust for battle.  
The heightened lust for battle required for this state can cause the user to act rashly. Taking damage in order to fuel one's battle lust and become stronger can backfire if the user accumulates too much physical damage to continue fighting effectively  
In this state your hair becomes tyrian purple and in color and your eyes attain a magenta-like color irises as well and also retain visible black pupils.

Perfected Ultra Instinct (Dragon Ball Series)  
Cost: 25 SP  
Required:Ki (Dragon Ball Series)  
You have ascended to the pinnacle of martial prowess, achieving a level of mastery so profound that even the gods themselves struggle to attain it. Perfected Ultra Instinct, often deemed the "absolute peak" of martial arts, is your ultimate skill.

This technique grants you the ability to operate at a level beyond conventional human limitations. Unlike ordinary individuals who must consciously think about their actions and await the transmission of commands from their brain through the nervous system, you have transcended this limitation. Every part of your body operates autonomously, independently thinking and acting in perfect harmony.

In the heat of battle, your body effortlessly reacts to any situation or threat with unparalleled precision and timing. You need not even acknowledge the presence of danger; your responses are automatic and flawless. You can engage in combat with supreme effectiveness, even while your focus is diverted elsewhere, rendering you virtually invincible. This transformation will also maintain your body at its peak performance as long as it remains active, ensuring that you always operate at the zenith of your capabilities, while magnifying your strength and abilities to a degree two or even three times greater than your previous mightiest transformation.

This state of Perfected Ultra Instinct will now be your default condition, marked by your hair radiating a resplendent white glow, with your eyes shining a piercing silver light. You can toggle this power on or off at your discretion.

Spirit Control (Dragon Ball Series)  
Cost: 10 SP  
Required: Ki (Dragon Ball Series), or Half-Saiyan (Dragon Ball Series)  
You have learned the Art of Spirit Control from the planet Yardrat.  
While you have not mastered every technique, you start off with the proficiency Goku possesses during the Android Saga.  
Thus you now have greater Ki Control, and Instant Transmission, which also comes with the ability to sense other living beings.  
You also have the necessary knowledge to continue your spirit control training to the point of mastery, which will allow you to gain new abilities along with making your Ki more potent in strength.

*Elder Paibaru*  
Required:Hakkyokuseiken (King of Fighters)  
Your mastery and knowledge of the Qigong art Hakkyokuseiken has helped you to gain full mastery and ability with Spirit Control on par with Elder Paibaru who trained both Goku and Vegeta. This grants you knowledge and skill to create perfect ki clones of yourself with no division of power. The ability enlarge yourself to that of the size of a giant. The skill to fully restore yours or anyone else health to its peak, And finally Forced Spirit Fission which allows you to after getting into physical contact with a opponent you will be able to steal their energy and can either absorb it yourself, disperse it, or send it into other people or living things you touch, This technique can also undo fusions such as removing beings absorbed by Majin or Potara fusions, Should Someone or something also have absorbed energy from living beings you can return that to the original people they belong to without any physical contact.

God Ki (Dragon Ball Series)  
Cost: 20 SP  
Required: Ki (Dragon Ball Series), or Half-Saiyan (Dragon Ball Series)  
Through either training with the gods or somehow learning to break the barriers of the limits of mortals, you have obtained God Ki.

Compared to regular Ki, God Ki is much denser and much easier to control. You also gain an immense boost in power compared to your full power when using your regular Ki.

While you use God Ki, no one who does not possess God Ki or reached the level of the Gods in power, can sense your energy.

You also become immune to the effects of dark magic, but you can mimic the effects should you have the necessary knowledge.

Across the Abyss (Raildex)  
Cost: 25 SP  
You have crossed the abyss of Da'at, a void that binds all of the Sephirot. Thus, you have stepped into the Territory of God, obtaining Daʻat Elyon, Higher Knowledge on the workings of the universe. Rather than getting encyclopedic knowledge of every technique or spell, this gives you an intuitive understanding of the underlying principles of both natural and supernatural parts of the world.  
With but a glance, you can comprehend how powers, spells, and even basic energies interact and function at their most fundamental level. Allowing you to interfere with the inner workings of those phenomena. Potentially, you will be able of even such feats as fundamentally changing the cosmology of the universe itself, albeit it will take a great deal of preparation.  
As you see the truth of the world, you are unaffected by the changes to reality and timelines. While your perceived history may change, your true self can never be rewritten, even if someone recreates a universe dozens of times over.  
Finally, this newfound knowledge also extends to your own powers. You start off with complete mastery over every single aspect of the powers currently available to you, thus obtaining an unshakeable foundation which you can freely improve upon, easily incorporating newly encountered phenomena and principles into your powers, or developing entirely new aspects from scratch.  
This also puts you and your powers on a fundamentally higher level of existence, with those who have not stepped into the abyss being inherently lower than you on a cosmic hierarchy. Your abilities are now beyond the reach of such beings; thus, they cannot tamper with or otherwise affect them, and any attempts to resist your powers will be much less effective.  
Do note that you can still be overwhelmed by the sheer firepower, although somebody who has not crossed the abyss like you or achieved a similar state will need to be at least multiple orders of magnitude stronger than you to even begin to contend with you.  
*Transcendental Soul*  
Required: Universal Power Plant, Engine of Escalation, Resonance, or Free Form Style  
Even after your ascension, your soul continues to constantly evolve to new heights. As such, it now naturally generates a transcendantal energy of higher quality than anything you can naturally encounter in any world, with every energy source within you subsumed into one pool.  
This transcendental energy can be used as a substitute for any other form of supernatural energy, such as mana, chakra, psionic energy, and so on, allowing you to directly interfere with any supernatural system. Moreover, with transcendent energy being inherently of higher quality, all of your spells, abilities, etc. that utilise it will become exponentially more potent, and any usage of this energy becomes completely undetectable to those who did not reach similar levels of strength and enlightenment.

With your knowledge, you can effortlessly interfere with the spells and abilities of your adversaries, cancelling, hijacking, reverse-engineering, and even improving upon them.

Lord of the Dead (Hercules)  
Cost: 50 SP  
You have been imbued with the essence of Hades, Lord and God of the Dead, and Ruler of the Greek Underworld, specifically the Underworld seen in Disney’s Hercules-”Ugh.” \-With this, you gain his godly physiology, his power, the Underworld itself, among a few other things. As a small bonus, you have become a master in the arts of dark humor, quick wit, and smooth talking. With this, your charisma is, simply put, divine. Even when everyone doesn’t trust you at all, you’re able to trap even other gods in your casually honeyed words, effectively becoming a paragon of what every sleazy car salesman dreams of becoming one day.

Firstly, as the God of the dead, you possess powerful abilities, such as raising the dead, animating corpses, and having them do your bidding. You have a body made of smoke, able to turn intangible at any given time. Not only are you immensely durable and strong, as a God would be, but you’re also immortal in the ageless sense. You can die, but you’ll be banished to the Underworld and are forbidden from exiting for a set time depending on-”How hard you get your butt kicked\~\! Don’t rely on it too much though, kid. It’s not fun.”

With your-”Smokin’ hot bod-”, you have access to both typhokinesis and pyrokinesis, able to generate and manipulate those two elements constantly if you wish. You can conjure inanimate objects using your smoke, such as liquids, cigarettes, thrones, chariots, etc., and use these elements as a medium to transport creatures from the Underworld (along with people who owe you or you own) to your location. From jet black alicorns and small imps, to three-headed dogs and hydras, you’ve got quite the menagerie of monsters at your beck and call.

You can make deals, wagers, and pacts with anyone who agrees with your terms. ”Make the rules, use that newly gained charisma, and souls, power, people, all sorts of things and doo-dads just fall right into your lap. Word of caution, though. The people you’re making deals with can just as easily bend the rules as you can, provided they got enough wit on ‘em.”

The Underworld follows your every word, and the living shudder at your name. All hail Hades, God of the Dead.  
”And hey, if you ever do see Wonder Boy, give him a good punch in the throat for me. As a thank you, of sorts. Sure, it was never my way of doing things, but seeing as I’m trapped here for the time being, ‘needs must’ and all that.”

Senjutsu (DxD)  
Cost: 8 SP  
Senjutsu is the power to sense and control the flow of life force in living beings.  
It can deal interior damage to others by disrupting or severing the life force of their opponent's, and it is also capable of bypassing conventional defences, preventing others from using their own abilities, and forcefully putting others to sleep. It can also be used to seal away other beings, and advanced users could even master esoteric techniques like increasing the luck of others by controlling the flow of their life force or to grow older temporarily, gaining access to powers that would only be available in a more matured state.  
It can be used to remove curses, poisons, diseases, or just bolster their life force for a regenerative healing effect. Meanwhile, it's not the best at rapid healing, it's also capable of healing esoteric damages like restoring lost lifespan or otherwise hard-to-detect hidden injuries.  
It also gives the user the ability to sense and perceive life force, which, even at the most basic level, allows for locating living beings and giving a basic read of their general wellbeing. At advanced levels, to sense the presence of Sacred Gears in people or read the movements of others just from their aura.  
Senjutsu heavily relies on an understanding of nature, so most of the techniques are related to it, like manipulation of mud, earth, and plants, but it struggles with manipulation of the artificial.  
Normally, all Senjutsu users are capable of learning Touki as it forms a complete power system, but for this CYOA, it is treated as a separate power, which makes you incapable of learning Touki just from Senjutsu, unless it is purchased.  
*Sennin*  
Required:Chakra (Naruto)  
Your Senjutsu enables you to forgo hand signs for molding your chakra in favour of using highly efficient magic circles, which, when sufficiently practiced, enable you to use ninjutsu techniques in a near instant.  
As chakra is also based on your own life force, both your reserves are combined, which can be used interchangeably for both systems.  
You also become a natural sensor-type ninja, as it’s a basic Senjutsu technique.  
*Kasha*  
Required:Nekomata  
You will gain access to the racial power exclusive to the Nekomata in the world of DxD, called Kasha. It can be used to summon spiritual flame-covered wheels said to be able to lure the dead to the other world.  
A skilled enough Senjutsu user can imbue it with the power of purification, turning dark beings like vampires to ashes in contact, and it will even affect creatures who overcame their racial weaknesses, as the flames won't stop burning until they change the reason and principle of their existence.  
It can be used in conjunction with other sealing techniques to empower them.

This will also give access to all the abilities the Nekomata native to the DxD world have.  
*Aspiring Sage*  
Required:Touki (DxD)  
Your skill and talent in utilizing life force are prodigious. You possess a genius-level intuition for senjutsu. Your body is inherently blessed with enormous amounts of life force. With time and effort, you will be able to achieve Sagehood, and your potential could allow you to surpass even Sun Wukong himself.

Holy Light (DxD)  
Cost: 10 SP  
You obtain the power to wield the Holy Light, which is a part of the divine power system governing divine protection, mercy, and miracles, making it possible to practice exorcism, wield and grant blessings, and even sanctify objects like holy water and crosses. Your power is especially effective against dark beings like devils, fallen angels, and vampires.

This also gives you a strong holy factor, which makes you a naturally talented wielder of all kinds of holy weapons, and experienced users could even master the legendary Holy Fist technique by undergoing rigorous and constant training.

Of course, the Holy Light is not limited to using weapons and rituals; you can also fire off blasts of the Holy Power, and with sufficient mastery, you might even form the light into much more deadly projectiles like the Angel’s spear of light.

Your talent and affinity for the element allow you to tap into other power systems as long as they are connected to the light. And the holy element and light element can also be wielded and recombined separately, which can be used to master powers like holy lightning, holy fire, or even pure light manipulation.

You will not need to worship or believe in the Christian God to wield this power, and the light will not abandon you even as a dark being.  
The Violence of Heaven (DxD)  
Cost: 20 SP  
Required:Holy Light (DxD)  
You become equal to the greatest exorcist humanity has ever seen, Vasco Strada. With you becoming a true master at wielding the Holy Light, including its advanced techniques like the Holy Fist.

You will also receive the benefits of comprehensive Exorcist training with both practical and encyclopedic knowledge of all dark creatures, which updates for whatever world you find yourself in. You also become a master theologian, mainly for Christianity but also giving general knowledge for every other local religion. Your training also includes the local supernatural and/or magic systems, which doesn’t give you the capability to use them, but you will have enough knowledge to recognize and understand them and exploit their flaws for your benefit.

Your affinity as a Natural-Born Holy Sword Wielder is so great that it will act as a power multiplier upon any Holy Armaments you wield, pushing them way beyond what they would be capable of normally.

Thanks to the Holy Energy coursing through your veins, your physical might, speed, durability, and stamina are immense, allowing you to fight even Satan class enemies. With just your sheer presence, you purify and bless the land you walk upon.

You are naturally beloved by all that is holy, making every holy being comfortable in your presence.  
*White God in Heaven*  
Required:Fragmented Divinity  
Required:Angel (DxD)  
Required:Sacred Gear Engineer (DxD)  
You are the successor of the Biblical God \- or at least the version from DxD \- inheriting his knowledge and a fragment of his Divinity, although it is up to you to nourish and cultivate that fragment into something more. Your Holy Factor vastly outstrips even the strongest of the Angels, and the ease at which you wield Holy Light is unrivaled. You gain Creation, Life, and Light as Domains equal to your Primary one.

With the knowledge you inherit, you automatically become a master craftsman and creator of magical artifacts, capable of creating Longinus-class Sacred Gears provided you have the right materials. Furthermore, you also gain expert-level knowledge of sealing and various forms of magic, both as an outside observer and a practitioner. This knowledge includes how to create your own Angels and a version of the System of Heaven to monitor and regulate faith and distribution of miracles.

Should you find yourself in a version of the world of DxD then you gain authority over the System of Heaven on a level equal to God himself.

Touki (DxD)  
Cost: 7 SP  
You gain the ability to use a basic form of life-force manipulation, also called fighting spirit, often achieved through sheer physical training or by learning it by practicing senjutsu.

Touki is an external manifestation of life-force in the form of a white aura wrapped around the user, amplifying their offence, defence, and speed. Releasing high amounts of Touki can generate wind pressure and crack the ground around the user. At advanced mastery, it can also be channelled through weapons, disperse attacks, cause massive shockwaves, or even be used as a ranged projectile.

The natural colour of the aura changes when combined with other powers.

Overconsumption of life-Force can cause permanent harm to the user’s lifespan, which requires specialized healing to restore.  
*Elemental Touki Cloak*  
Required:Chakra (Naruto)  
Combining your touki with chakra infused by the element you have affinity for allows you to form an elemental cloak. Your aura will change colour based on your affinity and enhance it based on the element. Lightning would massively boost the speed enhancement, while earth affinity would make its defensive properties much more robust.

Your elemental cloak will also change your aura properties, making your Touki-enhanced attacks burn, cut, shock, bruise, or stick, depending on your element.

If you have access to elemental Kekkei Genkai, then it can also be used as a cloak, massively increasing its general power boost.  
*Cursed Aura*  
Required:Cursed Energy Manipulation (Jujutsu Kaisen)  
You gained the ability to harness cursed energy fused with your aura without descending to madness. This will make your combined powers more potent, and because of the duality of your energy, the Reverse Curse Technique becomes much easier to achieve and will allow you to convert cursed energy directly into life-force. When more cursed energy is mixed into your aura, its colour becomes darker.

Finally, because of the more flexible nature of Touki, it allows you to manipulate the texture of your own mixed aura, like giving it a sharp or rough texture.

Power of Dominance (Castlevania)  
Cost: 20 SP  
This is the greatest and primary ability of the Dark Lord, and what makes the Dark Lord the Ruler of Chaos.  
This ability allows you, like the Dark Lord, to use all the power and abilities of beings that you defeat in combat and/or kill, allowing you to absorb their souls and completely control them, thus gaining access to all of their abilities and power.  
The power itself is extremely dangerous to handle, as those not specifically prepared for its power aren't able to contain it, and thus die. However, this isn't a danger for you, for you are perfectly matched for the Power of Dominance.  
*The Dark Lord*  
Required:Castlevania (Castlevania)  
You are the new Dark Lord, also known as the Prince of Darkness or Demon King. As the Dark Lord, your will extends across all Devils/Demons, allowing you to bend the demonic spirits to your command.

This has enhanced your power of Dominance, making it so you no longer have to just defeat individuals in combat. Instead, you can now have individuals swear themselves to you, binding their souls to you and Castlevania, tying their very existence to your power. They become as much a part of you as Castlevania has become. This allows you to do as you please with them, such as giving them access to any abilities you or those bonded to Castlevania have, changing their form, reviving them if they are killed, or even erasing their very soul from existence. It's up to you.  
Your bond with Castlevania has become complete, making the Castle now an extension of you and your power. The Castle can freely change its form to suit your desires and control its interior dimensions as you wish. It also makes you aware of all that happens and is happening on its grounds, acting as a focus for your powers. Moreover, it can revive or recreate those in your power or service through the Castle if they die.  
You also gain the knowledge & experience of all previous Dark Lords.

Hellspawn (Image Comics)  
Cost: 35 SP  
You are a Hellspawn, a being that was formerly human but made a deal with a Lord of Hell for a favor and, in return, were used as an officer for their army. When a Hellspawn is created, their bodies are reforged and infused with a dark energy called Necroplasm. While most Hellspawn tend to look grotesque (and that's being nice), you will look as you currently do, only brought to peak physical condition, bonded with a sentient and constantly evolving neural parasite also made of Necroplasm, which takes the form of a suit linked directly to their host's central nervous system. Yours is a K-7 model, a stronger, more purebred, and adaptive variant, making you a stronger Hellspawn. The suit feeds on the souls of those it kills to enhance, adapt, and evolve itself in response to your needs, wants, desires, and the stimuli it encounters. The suit is able to shift itself into any form you need and can take on various weapon forms for combat, only really limited by your imagination. It feeds off the Necroplasm (or any other spiritual energy you possess) in your body to sustain itself. The suit will move on its own to protect you even when you are unconscious. The costume can also feed off evil energy from the physical world, feeding off the ambient evil of people, animals, and even certain parts of cities.

The combination of a Necroplasm body and Symbiote being much denser than your mortal body gives you greatly superhuman strength that can go toe to toe with high-level angels and demons, speed such that you can dodge light, durability, reflexes, etc.

The greatest ability of a Hellspawn is their vast magical powers, though limited by your power supply, (though this can be replenished with time or absorbing it from spiritual sources). Though the power source is finite, what you can do with it is only limited by your imagination. Some of the ways this magic has been used include resurrecting the dead, firing blasts of necroplasmic energy, teleportation, transmutation, elemental manipulation, shape-shifting, flight, talking to animals, invisibility, multidimensional portals , space-time manipulation, soul manipulation, reality warping, regeneration, feeding off the evil sins and negative energy to augment yourself and refill your reserves, Healing, phasing, psychic powers, telekinesis, cosmic awareness. The list goes on.

Another effect of this transformation is that you now contain 6000 lost souls called the Legion. These are the souls of those who died during the same hour that you were transformed. The power from these souls renders you uncontrollable by the lords of Hell. You can, with practice, learn to access their knowledge and experiences. You can also cause these souls to manifest themselves physically as Hellspawn, allowing them to appear and aid you in combat wherever you are. You can talk to these souls and free them by completing any unfinished business they have, and while this lowers the effective force of the Legion, the souls that choose to stay will become stronger and more tempered to battle, lowering the quantity but raising the quality of the Legion.  
Hellspawn are practically immortal unless beheaded by a weapon of heaven or by powerful magic. Though you can be rendered powerless (and therefore mortal) in "Dead Zones" small patches of Earth that are Heaven's domain. Also, you possess a degree of acausality, meaning that any changes to your past or future self will have no effect on the current you.  
Note that as time passes, Hellspawn only grow more powerful and dangerous.

Seraphim (Supernatural)  
Cost: 30 SP  
As a Seraphim, your spiritual form and voice will prove overwhelming to most mortals. It can cause effects such as burning eyes or bleeding eardrums. Your size has been described as "approximately the size of the Chrysler Building." When outside of a vessel and on the physical plane, you will appear to humans as either a brilliant white light or a bluish luminous smoke.  
Becoming a Seraphim has granted you a whole host of abilities, such as nigh-invulnerability (angels are immune to all forms of harm except Angel Blades, Holy Fire, and beings more powerful than themselves, such as Archangels, and Primordials). You also possess limited cosmic awareness, allowing you to have knowledge and awareness of certain topics in the universe, including demons, Enochian symbols and magic, spells, prayers, and all languages (dead or alive, written and spoken). Angelic senses and perception are incredibly enhanced, enabling you to recognize beings based on their body odour and genes, see atoms and ions, hear conversations from miles away, and taste every molecule in a meal. You can also see the true form of other angels, demons, and reapers, as well as sense the location of every being in the universe, except those protected by Enochian magic and those stronger than you who choose to hide and Teleporting wherever you senses reach. Furthermore, you possess limited chronokinesis, allowing you to travel through time, send others forward or backward through time, and manipulate time itself (e.g., freezing or speeding it up). However, repeated use of these abilities can be draining on your Grace. Additionally, you have a whole host of additional abilities, including reality warping, telepathy, telekinesis, high level healing & Biokinesis, advanced Dreamwalking, and the ability to hear prayers directed at you.  
You have also been given an Angel Blade and Sword. These weapons can be used to kill most supernatural beings by channelling your Grace/Soul against your opponents. However, they are unable to kill beings stronger than you, such as Archangels. If lost or stolen, you will always be able to call them back to you.  
Be aware that while within a vessel, angels only possess their powers thanks to their Grace. If your Grace is taken or drained, you become like a human, retaining only your angelic senses, while your Grace slowly regenerates. The regeneration process could take months or even years, depending on how much has been taken.

Champion of Chaos Undivided  
Cost: 10 SP  
Embracing the unification of Chaos, your soul has become the Champion of Chaos Undivided, making your form constantly mutates and adapts based on your self-belief. As long as you believe yourself to be something, you will be it. With this, you gain the ability to alter your size, shape, and physical attributes at will. This versatility allows you to respec your combat abilities on the fly, growing additional limbs, merging with your weapons and technology, or assuming monstrous forms tailored to each battle. Your body becomes a canvas of endless possibilities, embodying the essence of Chaos itself. You can still retain your original form and appearance, able to seamlessly revert to it at will  
*Apocalypse Throne of Ruins*  
Required:Alpha Plus-Class Psyker (40k)  
As the inheritor of Chaos Undivided's mantle, you become the Harbinger of Ruin and Herald of the Apocalypse, a newly born Chaos God of Annihilation. With your ascension, you gain access to a new warp realm known as the Annihilation Abyss, allowing you to wield the raw power of the Warp to seep into every corner of existence. The Annihilation Abyss hungers for the collapse of order and the triumph of chaos, growing stronger as the universe teeters on the brink of annihilation. You gain the ability to summon and control daemons from all four Chaos Gods, wielding their combined might to unleash devastation on a cataclysmic scale. The Annihilation Abyss empowers your abilities to sunder reality, tearing through dimensions and unleashing waves of destructive energy.

Champion of Khorne (40k)  
Cost: 10 SP  
Your devotion to the Blood God has tainted your soul and turned you into the Champion of Khorne, granting you an insatiable thirst for battle and an unparalleled affinity for bloodshed. Whenever you engage in combat or witness bloodshed, your physical abilities and combat prowess are enhanced exponentially. Your strength, speed, and endurance surge to supernatural levels, making you a relentless force on the battlefield. The more blood that is spilled around you, the stronger you become, empowering you to continue your rampage without tiring or relenting.  
*The Throne Of Blood And Skulls*  
Required:Alpha Plus-Class Psyker (40k)  
You have become the ultimate vessel for Khorne's wrath, inheriting Khorne's mantle as the Chaos God of War. With your ascension, you gain access to a new warp realm known as the Bloodstorm, a turbulent realm of eternal battle and bloodshed. This realm feeds on the conflicts and violence of the universe, growing stronger as you unleash your fury. As you tap into the power of the Bloodstorm, your physical strength and combat prowess grows infinitely, allowing you to cleave through armies and even planets with ease. Through your newfound realm, you can summon and command legions of bloodthirsty daemons and creatures of Khorne, empowering your forces and spreading carnage across the mortal realms.

Champion of Tzeentch (40k)  
Cost: 10 SP  
Embracing the God of Change, your twisted soul have been chosen to become the Champion of Tzeentch's. Your very presence now warps and distorts the fabric of reality around you. The environment becoming unstable and unpredictable, constantly shifting and reshaping itself to confound and hinder your enemies at your command. Illusory barriers, twisted landscapes, and unpredictable phenomena manifest to protect you and impede those who oppose you. This ever-changing terrain serves as both a shield and a weapon, granting you a strategic advantage in any confrontation.  
*Kaleidoscope Throne of Change*  
Required:Alpha Plus-Class Psyker (40k)  
You have become the Changer of Ways and Master of Warp Sorcery, inheriting Tzeentch's mantle as the Chaos God of Change. With your ascension, you gain access to a new warp realm known as the Shifting Nexus, a realm of kaleidoscope madness that's constantly morphing and reshaping at your command. As the Shifting Nexus feeds on the ever-changing nature of the universe, your mastery over magic and sorcery grows. You can effortlessly twist and warp the fabric of reality, unleashing devastating spells and manipulating the flow of time. The Shifting Nexus serves as a wellspring of demons and forbidden knowledge, granting you insights into the secrets of the multiverse, and empowering your forces to spread madness inducing knowledge across the realms.

Champion of Nurgle (40k)  
Cost: 10 SP  
Embodying the decay and resilience of diseases, your stagnant soul have become the undying Champion of Nurgle, turning your body into a living vessel of pestilence and disease. Your body becomes host and ruler to a myriad of virulent plagues and contagions, emanating a miasma of filth and decay. Merely being near you weakens and sickens your foes, draining their vitality and sapping their strength. Your own constitution becomes nearly impervious to harm, allowing you to endure wounds and injuries that would cripple even the mightiest warriors.  
*The Rotting Throne of Entropy*  
Required:Alpha Plus-Class Psyker (40k)  
You have inherited the unchanging stagnation and sweet rot of pestilence, inheriting Nurgle's mantle as the Chaos God of Decay. With your ascension, you gain access to a new warp realm known as the Rotting Garden, where the cycle of life and death perpetually thrives. As the Rotting Garden feeds on the suffering and despair of the universe, your own durability and regenerative abilities reach unprecedented heights. You become an avatar of pestilence, spreading world ending plagues and diseases with a mere touch. The Rotting Garden teems with grotesque creatures and daemons of Nurgle, bolstering your forces and infecting reality with decay.

Ghost Rider (Marvel)  
Cost: 30 SP  
You have the demon Zarathos, the Spirit of Vengeance bound to your soul, and have gained the appropriate powers to boot. You can transform into the Ghost Rider, with the ability to lift 25 tons without noticing. You are superhumanly agile, and have a sixth sense for any person with powers (parahuman or otherwise), you are also able to 'exorcize' people, forcing any sort of evil spirits from their body. You are immune to physical injury, either completely no selling an injury or regenerating from it instantly, you are immortal, turning into the Ghost Rider and regenerating when major harm would come to you.

You have the ability to control hellfire, creating constructs and infusing it into an object (such as a motorcycle, Chain, Gun), making them much more powerful, and able to burn a person's soul and body, leaving wounds not even modern medicine can heal. You have the ability to perceive the sins of any other person and the ability to control any hellfire infused vehicle with your mind. You can summon hellfire infused chains from hell to grapple and drag anything.

Your penultimate ability is the penance state, having the target look you in the eyes and experience all the pain and suffering they have caused on another person. People like Jack Slash and the Slaughterhouse 9 will be completely carbonized and have their souls destroyed.

Beware, as a host for Zarathos, you will be pushed to hunt down true evil in your vicinity as well as protect the truly innocent with increasing force unless you come to an arrangement with him.

Shazam (DC Comics)  
Cost: 40 SP  
The Wizard Shazam has imbued you with the power of the Living Lightning. Saying the words "Shazam" changes you into your mental and physical peak, granting you your full potential; with children, this transforms them into an adult form. This further gives you the power of each god that gave their power to The Wizard; Solomon, Hercules, Atlas, Zeus, Achilles, and Mercury, further enhanced by The Wizard himself.

The Wisdom of Solomon grants you instant access to knowledge and directly advises you on all things. You gain the ability to speak any language, an eidetic memory, and a vast intellect.

From The Strength of Hercules, you gain a level of strength that is only matched by the likes of Superman or Wonder Woman.

From The Stamina of Atlas, you gain the ability to endure great physical exertion without tiring, have unlimited stamina, and survive without food, water, or any other sustenance.

From The Power of Zeus, you gain Zeus’s lightning bolts, able to generate and manipulate the "Living Lightning", which is the magic lightning that transforms you into Shazam. You can project the energy from your fingertips and even use the lightning bolt as a weapon by dodging it and allowing it to strike an opponent or other target. You also possess great magical talent, and the power of healing.

From The Speed of Mercury, you gain speed and reflexes similar to those of someone enhanced with the Speed Force, and can keep up with the likes of Wally West and Barry Allen, as well as gaining the ability to fly.

From the Courage of Achilles, you gain the durability to take hits from the likes of Superman, and the courage to go through mind-altering effects like fear toxin with inhuman willpower.

Despite the mention of Billy Batson's pantheon, you can choose to have the Egyptian deities that power Black Adam's version of Shazam.

Mark of Cain (Mortal Instruments)  
Cost: 30 SP  
The Mark of the Wanderer now graces your brow. It is an ancient rune of protection, first used upon Cain as a divine punishment by God himself. This protection is truly impenetrable by anything short of an omnipotent being. Anyone attempting to, or succeeding at doing you harm will find their efforts returned upon them sevenfold.  
This reflected harm is conceptual in nature. A normal human might find their punch throwing them across the room with a broken arm. But a Demon Lord dealing a grievous blow will find themselves swiftly turned into a pillar of salt.  
Having been marked to wander eternally by God, you are immune to the ravages of time, and are completely incapable of doing yourself intentional harm.

Cosmo (Saint Seiya)  
Cost: 20 SP  
All Matter is made of atoms and thus is connected to the greater universal Cosmo. With this logic, you gain an inner universe within you. You may “Burn” via exploding it to generate Cosmo, an insanely powerful and nigh-limitless energy source.  
By Burning Cosmo one can vastly increase their strength, speed, stamina, mental abilities, and senses beyond imagination. However, Cosmo does not offer any increase in durability and in fact, can harm the user if they Burn too much Cosmo. When someone burns Cosmo they release a massive amount of heat acting as both a weapon and pseudo armor. With training, it is possible to generate other elements at extremely potent levels instead. Such as cold temperatures near absolute Zero at 6th sense and true zero with the 7th and beyond with higher Senses. Cosmo may be used as a projectile or solid light constructs, and may also generate elemental attacks and effects with the right training and knowledge. Cosmo also grants an extremely potent ability to manipulate atoms. This ability is generally used to destroy things at an atomic level but can also be used to create or change matter. Cosmo can also be used for Telekinesis, Telepathy, transformation, and anything given enough knowledge and training and a high enough Sense.

You begin with your 6th Sense unlocked and the strength of a Bronze Saint. Your Cosmo grants you strength equal to one ton of force and the ability to move at Mach one and possess the knowledge expected of a Bronze Saint in Cosmo usage.

You are also given a special armor known as a Cloth. Cloths are semi-sentient powerful artifacts that allow a Cosmo user to burn their Cosmo without strain and enhance your Cosmo and it will subtly assist them as it can. Cloths also have an Object Form which resembles a statue of whatever constellation it is named after. Each also comes with a Pandora Box which may repair superficial damage to a Cloth that is placed inside it.

Each Cloth can also come with a special ability. You may pick a single Bronze Cloth from Saint Seiya Canon or create your custom Cloth with a theme of your choice. A Bronze Cloth has durability able to withstand forces up to 4 tons and covers roughly half of its wearer's body. Lower-ranking clothes only cover part of the body but still slightly weaker protection to areas it does not cover. Only a Cosmo user can wear and use a Cloth as otherwise it is impossibly heavy.

Cosmo is broken into levels based on Senses with each more allowing one to further grasp reality and thus expand their Cosmos and ability to Burn their Cosmo.

The 6th Sense “Intuition” is unlocked when one can sense and begin training their Cosmo. Those who have unlocked their 6th Sense possess strength equal to 1-5 tons and the ability to move Mach 1-5. Bronze Saints possess abilities at the lower number while Silver Saints at the peak.

The 7th Sense “Miraculosity” is gained when one can grasp and connect to the Cosmo of the world around them. Those who have gained the seventh sense have strength anywhere from planetary to multi solar system and can move at the speed of light to start and can grow even faster. With extreme effort, one can travel to other local universes and realms.

The 8th sense “Arayashiki” can only be gained by being able to sense your soul either by almost dying and burning your Cosmo to the limit and beyond. Or through a long period of deep introspection and training. Those who have succeeded in unlocking the eighth sense transcend death and can exist as only a soul and rebuild their body at will. They possess strength able to destroy multiple solar systems at a minimum and may grow to multiversal with mastery and a powerful enough Cloth. Those with the 8th sense may move countless times faster than the speed of light and can travel the universe and with time multiverse at will.

The 9th sense Divinity or Supreme Virtue is attained upon reaching enlightenment and is nearly impossible to achieve. Those who reach this Sense become full Gods gaining apropiate domains that possess effectively limitless Strength and Speed. They also can freely manipulate reality with nearly no limits.  
Whispers speak of even higher Senses that are held by only the most ancient gods and immortals.

Solar Exalted (Exalted)  
Cost: 35 SP  
You are given a Solar Exaltation without the Great Curse & without age limits. You have the abilities of Solar during starting character creation.

As an Exalted, you have "Charms," supernatural abilities which make you unbelievably and magically exceptional at things that you do, such as being able to leap several miles or being able to write a speech so impressive you're appointed leader of a country without even running for office. Charms also give you conceptual attacks and defenses comparable to Heroic Spirits from Fate, with Perfect Parries being able to do things like Block Sting, and Unblockable Attacks being able to hit Contessa actively dodging you. Charms cost Essence, a resource you have a finite amount of per day, and must regenerate over time (usually while resting) or by doing something at least mildly impressive (called "Stunting" or "Stunts"). Using Essence from your Peripheral pool (ambient energy) rather than your Personal pool (internal energy) gives you an "Anima Flare" a bright anime power-up energy field that makes it obvious you're doing something supernatural, with the degree of the anima flare corresponding to the peripheral Essence spent.

As a Solar Exalted your abilities are focused on being "excellent," with your Charms focusing on taking abilities you (or humans in general) already have and dialing them up to 11, like being such a strong Martial Artist you can kill Endbringers, or having such a commanding and Charismatic presence you can convince supervillains to turn themselves in.  
Sorcery Unbound (Exalted)  
Cost: 10 SP  
Required: Solar Exalted (Exalted), Lunar Exalted (Exalted), Sidereal Exalted (Exalted), Alchemical Exalted (Exalted), Terrestrial Exalted (Exalted), or Exigent (Exalted)  
Sorcery and Necromancy, magical arts of great power with which Exalted of all stripes use to achieve miracles, going far beyond simple Charms. However, there is a catch to this; the two arts are incompatible with each other by default, advancement in one art inhibiting development in the other, and forcing Exalts to choose between mastering one, and mastering neither.  
No longer. Now, your proficiency in both Sorcery and Necromancy are transcendental, allowing you not only to master both arts without limit, but also allowing you to develop your mystical skills up to the Third Circle regardless of the strength of your Exaltation, even if you are but a Terrestrial. Furthermore, you are not necessarily limited to the mystical arts of Creation, either: If you had the knowledge and resources, you could learn the arts of the Man-Machine and God-Machine Protocols of the Alchemicals, or even the Glamour Sorceries of the Raksha.

Aasimar (D\&D)  
Cost: 10 SP  
You become infused by the planes and energies of pure goodness.  
This changes your body and soul, for one thing it makes you moderately ‘more’ than a normal human in just about every which way, it also makes you incredibly and supernaturally beautiful, although not in a seductive manner, your beauty being more akin to a sacred piece of art. This beauty is supernatural in that it is not only due to your physical traits but also a supernatural tendency amongst all that view you to find your traits incredibly beautiful. Your very soul also becomes a thing of incredible beauty and value. You gain an incredible affinity for all things of light and goodness, you can feel peoples prayers and channel pure positive energy to heal and banish evil and corruption. You will find it very hard to be anything other than good and just to the people around you, it will not be impossible, but you will find that it goes against your base instincts. You can also call weak angels and celestials from the heavens, who will grow stronger as you do, to help you every so often, the can also be from the retinue of any good aligned deity if you choose to have your heritage specifically from them. although your bloodline cannot come directly from any greater or middling deity, you being at least several generations removed from them. You are even able to read/write/speak the beautiful language known as Celestial.  
Your hair shines like metal, like pure heavenly gold if you are blond, and like the purest most sacred ruby if you have red hair, and so on. Your eyes also turn golden with a soft glow to them. You can at will turn off and on a radiant halo which appears around or behind your head and will buff and heal your allies, and the innocent who are hit by its light.  
Of All That is Good  
Cost: 25 SP  
Required:Aasimar (D\&D)  
You embody light, life, and goodness in all it’s forms. Exquisite flowers bloom where you step and your light chases away evil, depression and all things commonly thought of as bad. You can see the sins of every living thing you can gaze at. Your halo evolves and no innocent can be harmed or hurt as long as its light reaches them, you can heal just about anything other than death away in the blink of an eye, and looking at you is now akin to a religious experience. You gain massive control and power over holy sun fire, spawning it and controlling it at will, choosing what and who it can hurt. Your presence is a balm to the soul chasing away depression and other such mental or spiritual afflictions of all that surround you, you gain an infinite lifespan as while you are still a mortal you now have more in common with other celestials such as angels than a normal human. You can every week resurrect one person fully and completely, but be very careful doing so, you might just take a soul out of heaven and their eternal paradise, and that is a very, very cruel thing to do. You can feel people that are in harms way and appear near them in order to help them, this feeling extends to about the size of New York city in a circle around you. You also gain a pair of functional angel wings.  
All these powers can be turned on and off at will or be dialled up and down as you please.  
Your comprehension of the Celestial language also increases. The Words of Creation were fragments of the precursor of the Celestial language. This precursor language, known as Supernal, was said to be the tongue of the gods themselves. Able to be understood by any sentient mind. And now you know a few of those words, able to learn more with time.

Ki (Dragon Ball Series)  
Cost: 20 SP  
You now posses the knowledge and the requisite skills to effectively utilize and cultivate the potent force known as Ki to its utmost potential. Ki, the life force that permeates the essence of every living entity, through the process of extraction, can be manipulated and harnessed beyond the confines of your physical form.

The versatility of Ki cannot be overstated. It serves to enhance both the body and spirit, refining your proficiency with martial arts and propelling them to unprecedented levels, creating techniques from sealing, to powering up your stats, and even teleportation, its utilization is bound solely by the limits of your imagination. The magnitude of your reservoir of Ki corresponds directly to the potency of your physical constitution, thus the more powerful your body is, the more you are able to draw upon this life force.

However, this process usually takes considerable time, effort and proper guidance to sustain. The rewards, though, are boundless, as Ki growth possesses the capacity for infinite expansion. Advancing along this path becomes progressively more arduous as you ascend to greater heights.

To facilitate the journey towards your Ki cultivation, a comprehensive manual is directly installed to your brain and can be accessed at any time. It meticulously outlines a step-by-step progression and provides explicit instructions for the diligent practitioner to follow, ensuring continued advancement and proficiency in the art of Ki manipulation as long as one remains dedicated to this pursuit.  
*Kaio-ken*  
Required:Eight Gates Technique (Naruto)  
You have been given the ability and skill with the Kaio-Ken. Originally made by King Kai, this technique grants one the ability to multiply their overall power of their basic capabilities, granting one the ability to increase their strength two times. Your skill with it, however, is enough for you to multiple up to ten times, but beware as the Kaio-Ken puts an immense strain on the body if you are unable to handle the multiplier. You do, however, possess the skill to use it without much strain when going times five. One of the greatest benefits of this technique, besides allowing you to increase your power to fight against those of above your original full might, is that the greater your handling of higher multipliers, the greater your Ki Control. Should you purchase the Spirit Control Upgrade your multiplier for the technique will be times fifteen.

### Tech and Artifice

Paranomalous (SCP Foundation)  
Cost: 35 SP  
Required:Anomaly Infusion  
Item: SCP-███  
Object Class: Keter/Thaumiel

Special Containment Procedures: SCP-███ is an unknown being capable of creating anomalous phenomenon, including but not limited cognitohazards, memetic hazards, anti-memes, amnestics, knowledge of pataphysics, xenobiology, memetic science, thaumaturgy, insight of the eclectic types of anomalies and their groundwork, alongside the required knowledge to produce it.

The more SCP-███ immerses itself in this repository of knowledge, the higher the probability of anomalous phenomena occurring in its vicinity.

Due to its frequent attempts at containment breach, the difficulty of containment and incapacitation, and the high threat of Foundation Exposure through repeated escapes SCP-███ is to be contained in site \[REDACTED\] until a further date.

Description: SCP-███ has no consistent form however it is believed to have been born in ████, making it ██ years old at the time of acquisition.
