As the Herald of your solar might, your Morning Star grants you free travel to anywhere within your light, at whichever speed you demand. As you grow in strength, so will your Morning Star. In time, you will be able to claim the authority of other sources of light throughout the cosmos in increasing orders of magnitude. No matter where you find yourself in the cosmos, you will always see yourself able to stand before the entirety of the dominant species that shares your home.

Blood of the Gods  
Cost: 15 SP  
Somehow, the very lifeblood of the gods: ichor flows through your veins. A spark of divinity has embedded itself within your soul, transforming your heart into a generator that steadily produces ichor and pumps it throughout your body. This gift has granted you immortality, eternal youth, and extraordinary physical abilities. You can lift semi-trucks above your head, leap onto the roofs of three-story buildings, and run at a maximum of 100 miles per hour for half a day before feeling fatigued. Your regenerative abilities are greatly enhanced; you can regrow entire limbs within minutes and even recover from losing half of your head. However, this is not absolute immortality, complete destruction of your head will still be fatal.  
On the esoteric side you become naturally resistant to curses, diseases, poisons, illnesses, and negative magical effects. Any that does take hold of you can be recovered from in a matter of hours to days depending on just how persistent and powerful they're.  
Beyond physical enhancements, the ichor is rich in mana, allowing you to use your own blood as a reservoir for casting magic. This can serve as your primary magical source if you lack one or act as a secondary pool to complement any magical reserves you possess. Additionally, your blood, if consumed by another, acts as a powerful healing elixir that grants them regenerative abilities on par with your own for a few minutes and restores their mana. It can also be stored and used as a magical reagent or in item creation to amplify an item's power, so be cautious about letting it fall into the wrong hands.  
Over time, the ichor will gradually transform your body, causing you to grow in power and, slowly but surely, evolve into an actual god. If you were already a god or divine in some other way this works as an amplifier to those power

The Composite Human  
Cost: 10 SP  
You have become the Composite Human; the hypothetical result of the amalgamation of the best aspects of every human who has ever existed or currently exists into a single individual. You possess every skill, trait, knowledge, experience and natural capability that any member of Homo sapiens sapiens has ever had without any fault or drawback.

Your physical condition and genetics are the pinnacle of humanity. You have the conditioned muscle mass of the strongest weightlifters, possess peak human senses, have enhanced durability thanks to abnormally high bone density, can run hundreds of kilometres without rest and can hold your breath for over 24 minutes, all to name but a few.

This also includes more exotic attributes such as Marfan syndrome which grants exceptionally flexible joints or congenital analgesia, enabling you to feel no pain. You may freely turn off and on particular traits and can display seemingly incompatible traits simultaneously. For example, you could concurrently have the light nimbleness needed to perform acrobatic stunts alongside the sheer muscle mass required for peak human strength.

Moreover, you can freely change your appearance, drawing upon the many features humans have had throughout history and the modern day. Do you wish to be as tall as Angus MacAskill, have the eyes of Audrey Hepburn or the beard of Frederick Douglas? It's all possible.  
However, it is your mind which is perhaps your greatest asset. Your intelligence is the best of humanity in every respect, enabling you to achieve mental feats on par with the most brilliant savants and geniuses of all time. Your charisma matches that of legendary leaders, your creativity mirrors the greatest artists and your wisdom draws from the collective insights of the most renowned philosophers.  
Furthermore, you possess every skill or expertise that any human has ever had. You know and understand all human knowledge across every possible field of study, are a master of every martial art ever created (including muscle memory), have perfect fluency in all forms of language, have intimate familiarity with every historical human event… the list goes on and on.  
You have an unlimited memory through which you can store and recall all of this information. This knowledge continuously updates as all of humanity's thoughts, actions and memories flow into you; even permitting a form of pseudo-mind reading if desired.  
Finally, while this power is based upon humanity within this universe, it will update no matter where you are, allowing you to become the composite of all humanity of the universe that you are in so long as they can be considered “human”. The more powerful the version of humanity, however, the longer it will take you to acclimatise to become a composite of them.  
*The Composite Genus*  
Required:Apex Specimen  
You are no longer limited to being merely a composite of humanity; your power now extends to similarly affect any other species or race that you exist as.  
Whether you are a vampire, orc, elf or any other being, you have become the singular fusion of your entire species. You possess all the traits, skills, knowledge, and abilities that your race has currently or has ever had in its history. If you are a hybrid of multiple races, you can become a composite of all of them respectively.  
What’s more, all of the capabilities, attributes and talents you have gained from being the composite of your race are enhanced to be significantly greater than any other member, as befitting of being the Apex Specimen. For example, if someone from your race was a once-in-a-lifetime prodigy in nature magic, your aptitude, power and potential with nature magic would substantially exceed theirs in every respect.  
*The Multiversal Composite*  
Required:Multiversal Constant  
You're no longer confined to just being the composite of humanity within your universe. Instead, your power now spans throughout your entire local multiverse cluster, making you the combined composite of every version of the Homo sapiens species from across all of these universes.  
As such, every trait, talent, knowledge and natural ability that any human has ever developed across your local multiverse, whether in the past or present, is now yours. For instance, if humans in one universe evolved to breathe underwater, you would have that ability. Likewise, you could tap into the complete scientific expertise of humanity from a highly technologically advanced universe.

Succubus/Incubus  
Cost: 12 SP  
You are a Succubus or Incubus, a demon who embodies desire, temptation, and danger, exploiting humanity's carnal desires. Your transformation enhances your body in several ways: your attractiveness is significantly increased, making you highly desirable. Additionally, your appearance will shift to match your idealized self. Your physical strength now allows you to toss humans effortlessly with one hand and move at speeds invisible to the naked eye. You also gain bat-like wings that enable flight and can retract at will. Furthermore, your lifespan extends into the thousands of years.  
Your true power, however, lies in your various minor supernatural abilities, including dream manipulation, lifeforce draining, shapeshifting, regeneration, healing, mind manipulation, mind reading, and illusions. Through dream manipulation, you can enter and alter others' dreams, interacting and draining life force without physical contact, and even trapping targets in their nightmares. Lifeforce draining ranges from leaving a person exhausted to completely withered, requiring direct contact for maximum effect. Initially, a mere kiss can exhaust someone.  
Shapeshifting allows you to adopt forms that resonate with your target’s desires, becoming more adept and diverse with experience. Regeneration depends on the lifeforce you've collected, allowing rapid healing and contributing to your longevity. Healing involves transferring some of your lifeforce to others, strengthening their regenerative abilities and potentially reviving the recently deceased.  
Mind manipulation starts with subtle influences, like amplifying emotions or directing attraction, growing to control even a powerful enemy with a look. Mind reading helps tailor your interactions by revealing desires and, eventually, deeper memories and thoughts when close by.  
For defense, you rely on illusions that initially affect only sight and sound but can evolve to involve all senses, drawing upon a target’s deepest fears.  
Despite these strengths, you have a weakness to silver, which severely harms you like acid upon contact  
Monarch of Desire  
Cost: 4 SP  
Required:Love & War  
Through your veins now flows the royal blood of your kind, causing your abilities as a Succubus/Incubus to far eclipse your kin, for you have become a Succubus Queen / Incubus King.

Your ascension into royalty has resulted in your natural form once again undergoing changes. To start off with, your beauty has become so great, even inhuman beings and your own kin will find you enchanting. Now, upon your head sits a pair of horns, through which supernatural abilities can be controlled and focused, allowing one to leave their hands free. From your back emerges a second set of wings, allowing for greater speed and maneuverability in the air.

This new blood has also caused your physical abilities to exceed even those succubi/incubi that follow the path of bloodlust. Now your strength has become monstrous, able to create tremors with a palm strike or blast a hole through an oil tanker with a slap. Your speed is blazing, able to reach hypersonic speeds, allowing you to race missiles. Your durability renders you immune to all but the strongest conventional weaponry, such as railguns and bunker busters. Finally, your sheer vitality has granted you biological immortality, as you cease aging upon reaching your prime.

Your supernatural abilities have increased immensely in scale and in power.

Starting off, dream manipulation and illusions have merged, allowing you to now blur the line between dreams and reality. This could allow you to perform feats such as creating illusionary organs that function like real ones.

Next, your lifeforce draining has grown to where your mere presence could drain your targets into desiccated corpses.

Further, your shapeshifting has overcome its initial limitations, now allowing you to freely change your appearance as you like. You are even able to develop more inhuman traits such as additional limbs or merging of traits such as your tail and a mouth, making it so you can eat with your tail.

Your regeneration has become partially passive, as any non-fatal wound no longer requires lifeforce to be healed. Instead, lifeforce is used to recover from any fatal injury so long as at least a hand amount of you remains.

Your healing has evolved the capabilities of enhancement and resurrection, as you can now transfer lifeforce to strengthen and prolong the lifespan of your target. As well as resurrect any dead so long as you have a piece of their corpse and lifeforce, scaling with the amount of time they had been deceased.

Finally, your mind manipulation has expanded its range, allowing it to affect those within a few blocks of you. It can also now affect abnormal beings such as golems and machines capable of limited thinking.

Your royal blood has also granted you two new abilities; conversion and malleability. Conversion is the ability to convert others into Succubi or Incubi depending on your preference. Those born of you naturally have such loyalty that they would sooner die than even consider the possibility of betraying you. Whilst, malleability is a change to your body’s nature based upon desires rather than logic. This allows your body to stretch, contort, and move in ways that would injure or potentially kill others with no issue.  
*Guide to Desire*  
Required:Monster of Desire  
Your innate connection to desire as a Succubus Queen / Incubus King has allowed you to understand and benefit from the desires of others, especially the obsessive ones. In particular, you are able to with a glance know one’s primary desire, and grow stronger the more those either around you or manipulated by you indulge in said desires, such as pushing one who has an obsession with Justice into acting like the punisher.

Required:Half-Devil (DxD)  
Your nature as a Succubus Queen / Incubus King has synergized with your Devil heritage. This union has granted two new attributes to your abilities. Firstly, you now gain extra free lifeforce when you complete a contract to add on top of whatever payment had been agreed upon. Secondly, your shapeshifting has gained the ability to grant abilities with your inhuman traits akin to what is seen with Stray Devils, yet controlled.  
*Disciplined Desire*  
Required:The Chad Grindset Enjoyer  
As a Succubus Queen / Incubus King you would be expected to be driven solely by selfish whims and all-consuming desires, yet instead you have sought the path of discipline and control over yourself. This newfound discipline and control have granted you new capabilities. Firstly, you are now nigh-immune to effects that alter and control your desires and emotions. Secondly, your martial talent has flourished into great talent at all you truly focus on, showing prodigious growth so long as you maintain that focus.

Apex Specimen

Lazarus Syndrome  
Cost: 30 SP  
You have contracted a transdimensional bacterium called malaise, which causes a condition that has been colloquially dubbed as 'Lazarus Syndrome'. This bacterium completely rewrites their host's personal dimensional structure, rendering them completely immune to any forms of premature ceasing as to preserve the host and in turn themselves. This typically manifests as the ability to come back from the dead.

But this isn't the end of your new abilities, however. The second most prominent effect Lazarus Syndrome causes is to occasionally generate powers in relation of how you died. Death by sword? Maybe you can disconnect your body parts, or perhaps become very good a swordplay. Death by crushing? Perhaps your body will become super-dense or allow you to become intangible. You never really get to choose, but it'll always be related to how you die. The more you know how you died, or will die, the more you can narrow down what power will manifest.

### Mental and Psychic

Watcher of a Thousand Eyes  
Cost: 4 SP  
Required:Mind's Eye  
Required:Spirit Sight (Mieruko-chan)  
You have gained the power to see. Any eye or perception-based powers become noticeably stronger and your vision cannot be obscured by any means \- whether through illusions or attempts to physically blind you such as curses or darkness \- as your eyes pierce through all which seeks to block your perception and allow you to gaze upon the Truth of this world.  
You have also gained the ability to project your vision outwards, conjuring innumerable phantasmal eyes through which you can see as if they were your own, matching and even surpassing your original eyes in terms of perceptive capability. These eyes count as your own eyes for the sake of any of your eye-based powers, meaning that if you have some kind of effect which only activates through line-of-sight you can activate it through your eyes. This connection for powers is one-way, as only you benefit from it.  
The eyes can fly in all directions at your running speed \- or even teleport if you possess the ability to \- and you can mentally control them, directing their movement as you see fit. There is no range limitation on how far these eyes can go from you, in fact you can sense through them across dimensional boundaries, seeing through them even if you are entire worlds away. Furthermore, the eyes are not truly present in the world and are capable of phasing through matter and most protections \- only held back by extremely powerful or specialized defenses \- and can only be perceived if you will it or if the observer possesses equal or greater perception to your own.  
As you create eyes your mind expands to accommodate them, spawning a new instance of thought for each eye you conjure, meaning you can never be overwhelmed by them. Your phantasmal eyes can be any shape or size provided they resemble an eye in some way, ranging from anatomical replicas of your own eyes to stylized eyes made of flowing lines.

Archive

Lie Eater  
Cost: 10 SP  
As the possessor of the Lie Eater ability, you gain an uncanny intuition, allowing you to discern with unerring precision when a person is telling a lie and precisely what the falsehood entails. This innate lie-detection ability becomes an indispensable tool in any social interaction or conflict.

Telepathy

This communication isn't just limited to words, allowing you to send images, emotions, or even memories. While you can force a telepathic connection, they are allowed to project harmful thoughts or emotions, such as pain. This has multiversal distance.

Dream Control

Black Mercy (DC Comics)  
Cost: 15 SP  
Required:Dream Control  
The shaping of dreams has evolved further to emulate the alien plant the Black Mercy. This evolution has turned your dreams from mere fantasies you can inflict into entire realities.

The primary feature of the Black Mercy is that by probing the pleasure centers of the target’s mind, a nearly perfect world is created for the victim while their psychic energy is harvested and pulled back to you. During this the victim is entirely paralyzed while they’re transported into the reality, and can only escape after noting small inconsistencies and actively willing themselves awake.

Unseen Hands

If you wish, the unseen hands can be retracted completely into your body at any moment, and in case of danger that would cause you bodily harm of which you are not aware, the hands will instantly and automatically react to protect you.

Required:108 Skills

*Sekhmet*  
Required:Witch of Sin (Re:Zero)  
Your Witch Factor of Sloth has resonated with the similar powers of your Unseen Hands have drastically empowered them to eclipse Sekhmet, the Witch of Sloth and second most powerful Witch to exist.

You have five thousand of them and each and every one has doubled in strength and can reach up to 1000 kilometers. Additionally, your miasma flows through each of your hands, allowing you to sense the world through each one. This enables you to manipulate them accurately without needing to physically see what they’re interacting with.

If you have Ten Thousand Hands of Avalokiteshvara you will have twenty thousand hands with a range of two thousand kilometers each.  
Thousand Hands of Avalokiteshvara  
Cost: 15 SP  
Required:Unseen Hands  
You now possess the ability to extend an astonishing ten thousand unseen hands simultaneously from your body, with an expanded range of up to 100 kilometers.  
These hands are now intricately connected to the life force of all things, so in addition to their inherent destructive power, each hand possesses the ability to siphon the life force when in physical contact with a living being, and then transfer that life force to the user to either heal them or to enhance the overall strength of the hands, as per the user's intention. The targeted individual experiences extreme weakening as their life force is drained, as they shrivel and wither rapidly leading to their expiration. The more the target is exposed to additional hands, the quicker the siphoning process, hastening their demise. Your unseen hands has also gained a high resistance towards psychic attacks of all forms.  
You can choose at will whether the unseen hands engage in siphoning the life force of others.

Virulent Hands  
Cost: 5 SP  
Required:Unseen Hands  
A malevolent curse has tainted your Unseen Hands, transforming them into instruments of potent poison and malignant diseases.  
Now, in addition to their inherent destructive power, each hand possesses the ability to infect a target with a myriad of rapidly acting diseases upon physical contact. Similar to venom injected through the poisonous fangs of a viper, these diseases will induce severe vertigo, convulsions, muscle paralysis, searing pain, internal haemorrhages, and organ failure within minutes of contact. If left untreated, the target is almost certain to expire within hours. The more the target is exposed to additional hands, the higher the dosage in their system, hastening their demise.  
As the user, you are completely immune to the diseases carried by these hands, and you can choose at will whether the hands inject the diseases when in contact with others.

The Hand Behind The Curtain  
Cost: 15 SP  
In a world entrenched in deception and power struggles, you possess supernatural skills and unparalleled expertise in planning, orchestrating, and manipulating others, allowing you to navigate the intricate web of influence with unrivaled finesse.  
As the Hand Behind The Curtain, you possess an innate understanding of the motives and intentions that drive people's actions. This insight empowers you to craft intricate, long-term strategies and campaigns that span vast domains, seamlessly accounting for all relevant factors, treasures, resources, and variables involved, orchestrating plans that could span millennia, all while ensuring that your true intentions remain hidden from prying eyes.

With your masterful manipulation skills, you become the unseen puppeteer, orchestrating events and pulling the strings from behind the scenes. Your grand designs encompass vast networks, enabling you to wield unparalleled control and shape the outcomes of pivotal moments. While others remain oblivious to your influence, you steer the development of civilizations and hold the keys to their destiny.

Additionally, your mastery extends to the art of acting, allowing you to assume different personas effortlessly. With this added ability, you can seamlessly blend into any role, concealing your true intentions as you manipulate those around you.

Wifi  
Cost: 4 SP  
Your brain is now fully connected to a high speed wifi that you can toggle on/off, enabling you to browse the internet and the infinite amount of data it contains as much as you like.  
Social media, Google, YouTube,,,etc you will be able to access everything in the online cyber space in your mind, and this connection can never be broken even if you are in different universes or dimensions.  
Since this connection to the internet is an arbitrary link in your mind, it can never be traced, hacked, or tampered with in any detrimental way.

Holmes  
Cost: 5 SP  
This power makes you a genius of deduction and perception. It doesn't make you any better at guessing, and you need sufficient evidence to make a conclusion. However, it is a lot less likely to be wrong than Tattletale's power.  
Sherlock Scan  
Cost: 8 SP  
Required:Holmes  
Your ability to plan and make predictive deductions is truly staggering. Whether in a bout of fisticuffs or at the chessboard, you are dozens of steps ahead of your opponents. Able to visualize entire engagements from beginning to end before the first blow is ever struck. This power includes minor supporting improvements to general intelligence, mental processing speed, multitasking ability, and senses.  
Moriarty  
Cost: 7 SP  
Required:Holmes  
You're now the equal and antithesis of Sherlock Holmes; while he is the world's greatest detective, you are the 'Napoleon of Crime'.  
You're still a genius of deduction and perception but your skills, abilities and knowledge have expanded to make you nearly unparalleled with regards to criminality and its planning in all its forms. You possess near-superhuman expertise and knowledge in every field of crime including forgery, blackmail, drug trafficking and more. You also have a powerful intuition regarding how best to apply your criminal expertise and knowledge to nearly any challenge you come up against.  
Your genius also encompasses Moriarty's greatest accomplishment, his global criminal network. You have an inhuman talent for setting up and controlling widespread, self-sustaining, successful criminal organisations with regard to any type of illicit activity. You can orchestrate and administrate these organisations in such a manner as to ensure their continuous secrecy and success.  
You could potentially build a world-spanning criminal underground in a matter of years, force entire governments to bend to your whims and have lifelong criminals too terrified of you to even say your name.  
The World's Greatest (Death Note)  
Cost: 5 SP  
Required:Sherlock Scan  
Required:Moriarty  
You have become the greatest in the criminal and legal worlds via the combined intellectual prowess of the greatest detective, L, and Light Yagami, the God of the new world.  
From L, you have gained deductive skills beyond human reason. You have a perfect memory, can instantly spot verbal and logical contradictions, find clues from minute details or actions, and have the ability to develop insidious verbal or physical traps that your opponents walk right into. However, your scariest power is your ability to psychoanalyze others. You can create a psychological profile and deduce crucial details of a target simply by knowing basic info about their actions, like time or location. You can narrow down suspects ridiculously quickly and find if they match your profile with a glance for most and a short conversation for the utmost perplexing cases.  
From Kira, you have gained a raw intellect, easily surpassing the entire world. Even without experience or resources, you can throw together complex world-altering plots. Your observational capacity can piece together the minute actions of others into their deepest secrets, goals, or short-term plans. You can then devise counterplans immediately after. You also have a penchant for manipulating others, using various pressures to make them dance to your tune. Finally, you have gained a natural charisma with your words and actions that causes others to pay attention to you, whether to follow or fear you.  
Your thinking speed, creativity, parallel processing, and learning have increased by a massive degree. You can solve unreasonably complex problems in minutes, master fields in hours, and establish secret societies in days. Depending on your personality, this level of intellectual superiority can lead to nihilistic viewpoints if you're unable to express it properly, like against a true rival.  
Elementary, My Dear (Type-Moon)  
Cost: 3 SP  
Required:Sherlock Scan  
Required: Tattletale, or Sarah Livsey/Lisa Wilbourn  
Elementary, My Dear: It's Quite Simple, My Friend is the Noble Phantasm acquired by Sherlock Holmes when materialized as a Servant. It is his Origin of "Elucidation" sublimated as a Noble Phantasm.

Even if the enigma that is being opposed is truly an unresolvable mystery, the route and the clues that will finally arrive at the truth of it will "appear" without exception. For example, even if the key to a treasure chest is lost, the key will end up "not being lost", and it appears that it can be definitely discovered somewhere in the world. (However, as one would expect, it does not suddenly appear in the middle of one's hand, and wherever it is, you and your collaborators must discover it)

### Mystic and Magic

The Dedicated Healer  
Cost: 15 SP  
You are the healer—the White Mage of a hero's party, the priest(ess) of some fantasy religion, or another support character who specializes exclusively in healing and supportive magic. By default, you are at your strongest when healing a specific individual within a foot of you. However, your effective range extends up to 100 meters in all directions, with the strength of your healing and supportive spells increasing in intensity as the target gets closer to you.  
Your repertoire includes spells to mend lacerations, restore lost body parts (even without the original part), repair soul damage, cure ailments and negative effects, undo transmogrification, and even resurrect the recently deceased. The speed of these spells varies: at your maximum range, they may take hours to complete, while for someone nearby, they can work in mere seconds.  
Beyond healing, you also have supportive spells. You can temporarily accelerate a target's speed by manipulating time, create shields that halve all physical or magical damage, cast wards to render them immune to specific elements temporarily, and imbue them with enhanced strength or other buffs.  
While this makes you the ultimate healer and support member for any aspiring hero, your powers are more of an affinity than a magic system. If you were to obtain a magical system or simply possess a pool of magical energy, your abilities and potential range would be significantly amplified. For instance, your resurrection spells would no longer be constrained by how long someone has been deceased. Furthermore, you would enhance any healing or support spells from other systems beyond their normal limits or create new ones, provided they focus on healing and buffing rather than combat or debilitation.  
A side effect of this affinity is that you're one of if not the best users for holy items, divine blessings and are generally well liked by holy or divine beings.

Samusara (Soulfire)  
Cost: 50 SP  
You are the latest reincarnation of the Samusara, the eternal Font and Source of Magic. Your existence is not merely an event but a transformative phenomenon.  
Your presence causes the very fabric of the world to awaken, generating spiritual energy that spreads throughout creation, allowing magic to take root once more. This spiritual energy fuels not only your abilities but also serves as the foundation for a new magical age.  
As the flow of magic suffuses the world, it triggers profound changes. Magical plants will sprout in forgotten corners of the land, animals imbued with mystical traits will emerge, enchanted objects of incredible power will surface, and specific regions will become magical nexuses.  
Even people will begin to awaken to their latent potential, gaining innate magical abilities or being born as natural spellcasters. Civilization itself will change, shaped by this resurgence of mystical energy.

You are the Source of these transformations, the beating heart of a magical revolution. This role endows you with unparalleled potential. Your capacity for all forms of magic is boundless, transcending the limits imposed on ordinary mortals.  
Though your magical reservoir may begin modestly, it grows rapidly, expanding with each use and mastery of your powers. Flight is an innate ability that comes instinctively to you, as natural as breathing.

As the Samusara, your magic knows no boundaries. Decades of training and experience will elevate you to unimaginable heights, where there is almost nothing you cannot achieve.  
Your abilities will include, but are not limited to: time travel, rewriting destinies, or peering into alternate timelines, opening portals between realms, connecting disparate worlds, or creating entire alternate dimensions, bringing forth creatures such as dragons, phoenixes, forging enchanted artifacts, birthing magical species, or shaping new magical ecosystems, granting great power to others, creating new schools of magic, or awakening dormant magical abilities in those around you.

Your power grows exponentially, with no true ceiling. The only limit to your potential is your own imagination and the wisdom with which you wield your gifts. For those that wield your power and the magic you bring forth, you can choose to either remove their access to it or otherwise take control of them if they do not remove it themself.

However, your connection to magic comes with a profound consequence. Should you die, the flow of magic across the world will begin to fade. Over time, magical plants will wither, enchanted creatures will vanish, and mystical energy will retreat into dormancy. Yet this is not the end.  
You are bound to the eternal cycle of Samsara. In time, you will be reborn, stripped of your memories but destined to rekindle the spark of magic once again. As you grow, your powers will return, and with them, your memories of past incarnations will awaken.  
The cycle ensures that magic will never truly vanish, as long as you continue to exist.  
*Fountain of Mystery*  
Required: Magecraft (Type-Moon), Old Magic (Type-Moon), or True Magic (Type-Moon)  
One of the greatest limitations of Magecraft, Old Magic and Mystery has always been their fleeting nature. As knowledge of these arts spreads and their practices become widespread, their potency diminishes.  
This weakening, a consequence of the collective understanding of magic stripping away its enigmatic power, has historically constrained even the most gifted practitioners. But now, through your ascension, that limitation is abolished.

You have become the Endless and Limitless Font of Magic, a wellspring of eternal power. No matter how many people uncover the secrets of Magecraft, Old Magic, or True Magic—no matter how many practice and utilize its intricacies—its strength will remain undiminished.  
Magic will no longer wane with understanding. Instead, the magic you embody is self-sustaining, thriving in perpetuity regardless of how broadly it is shared or how deeply it is studied.

As the source of this resurgence, you are intrinsically connected to all Thaumaturgical Foundations in existence. This connection grants you unparalleled knowledge of their inner workings, including every spell, rite, and secret they contain.

Even the closely guarded Magecrests—magical lineages passed through generations of mage families—are fully accessible to you. With but a thought, you can unlock the deepest mysteries hidden within these crests, no matter how long they have been guarded or forgotten.  
In worlds where Magecraft or Ley Lines are absent, your presence awakens latent magical energies, allowing you to create Thaumaturgical Foundations and Magecrests from nothing.  
The ley lines of the world stir under your influence, and new magical traditions take root. You become the architect of an entirely new magical ecosystem, giving rise to families, foundations, and the flow of magic where once there was none.

Your bond with Magecrests and their bearers grants you a unique form of immortality. These Magecrests now serve as second souls, tied to your essence. Upon your death, you gain the ability to be reborn through the Head of the Family that holds the Crest. By assuming their body, you prevent the extinction of magic and maintain the continuity of your presence in the world.  
This safeguard ensures that you are not forced back into the Cycle of Reincarnation until the very last Magecrest holder has perished. Only when all Magecrests are extinguished, and magic itself is in decline, will you return to the Samsara cycle to begin anew. Until then, your essence remains intertwined with the fabric of magical existence, guarding its survival and evolution.  
You are the Fountain of Mystery, a force that ensures magic’s endurance across the ages. No longer will the spread of knowledge dilute its potency. No longer will the loss of a single mage family spell the end of centuries-old traditions. Through you, magic flourishes eternally, unburdened by the limitations of secrecy or scarcity.

As the endless source of magic, you are not merely a practitioner or a guardian of Mystery—you are its heart and soul. With you, the boundaries of what is possible continue to expand, and the magic of the world becomes boundless.  
*Font of Life*  
Required:Nature Magic (Warcraft)  
As the Samusara, you were originally the Font of Magic and Spiritual Energy, with your influence on life energy being an indirect consequence of your power. Spiritual Energy, by its very nature, enhances all things, but now your mastery has evolved.  
Your connection to Life Energy has deepened, making it a direct and transformative force under your command.

You are no longer just a conduit of magic—you are now the Font of Life Energy, the wellspring from which vitality itself flows. Your presence alone becomes a catalyst for creation and growth. Wherever you go, the world around you flourishes in extraordinary ways,  
Flowers bloom to colossal proportions, becoming as large as houses. Trees grow into towering giants, their canopies touching the heavens like living mountains. Even the earth itself can respond to your will, transforming into a massive, living entity under your guidance. Entire ecosystems thrive and expand, reshaping the natural world into a paradise of vitality.  
You wield absolute authority over life energy, granting you the ability to: cure diseases, mend wounds, and restore vitality to living beings. Even terminal illnesses and genetic defects are no challenge to your power. Just as easily, you can unleash devastating plagues and biological calamities, spreading destruction wherever you choose.  
Your mastery over life energy extends to the very fabric of existence: shape entirely new lifeforms, from simple plants to complex, sentient species. These beings are not temporary constructs but fully independent creatures, capable of sustaining themselves without your intervention.  
Transform your own body into any form of life you desire, from the smallest insect to the mightiest beast. You can also adapt features from multiple species, blending their strengths into an unparalleled form.

Beyond creating individual lifeforms, you can fundamentally alter entire species, modifying their biology, behavior, and traits to suit your vision. These changes are permanent and self-sustaining, persisting even if your magic fades.

One of the most profound aspects of this power is its permanence. Changes made through Life Energy are not tied to your existence as the Samusara. Even if you die and magic disappears from the world, the lifeforms, ecosystems, and species you have shaped will endure. They are not dependent on your power to sustain them; they become independent entities, thriving as natural parts of the world.  
Your influence as the Font of Life ensures that your legacy will outlast your lifetime. The trees you grow, the species you create, and the cures you develop will remain, reshaping the course of life itself for generations to come.

As the Font of Life, you now embody the essence of vitality and creation. You are a force of nature, capable of transforming the mundane into the extraordinary. You heal, nurture, and build—but you can also destroy, corrupt, and reshape.

Your power over life energy is not only vast but also versatile, enabling you to act as a guardian, a creator, or even a harbinger of devastation, depending on your will.  
Through you, the boundaries of life are no longer fixed. They are as limitless as your imagination, eternally expanding and evolving.  
*Gift of Talent*  
Required: Anodite (Ben 10), Great Spirit (Re:Zero), or Fairy of Paradise (Type-Moon)  
Your connection to the boundless magic of the Samusara has deepened, granting you the ability to bestow unparalleled gifts of talent and transformation upon others. What was once a limited ability to enhance others has now grown into something far more profound and versatile.  
You can now share your knowledge of specific magical methods or the traits of magical races you are familiar with, gifting these abilities to others.  
Through your influence, you can: unlock latent potential within individuals, increasing their magical aptitude and talent far beyond their natural capabilities. Even those with no inherent magical inclination can become prodigies under your guidance.  
Or you can change the very essence of an individual, turning them into a more magical race. These transformations are not limited to simple physical changes; they bestow the abilities, traits, and magical potential associated with the new species. Whether it is the energy-wielding prowess of an Anodite, the ethereal grace of a Fairy of Paradise, or another form of magical excellence, the choice is yours.  
Your gifts, while extraordinary, are not without conditions. When you grant someone greater talent or transform them into a magical being, you have the option to impose Limits or Taxes on their continued existence.  
These conditions can take many forms, depending on your desires or the nature of the pact between you and the recipient: you may take years of life from them as payment, tying the gift of their new power to their lifespan, A binding magical contract can ensure their loyalty to you, making them your ally, servant, or agent, may extract a price in exchange for their transformation—whether it be material wealth, services rendered, or a promise to fulfill a future request.

Or you can create unique and creative conditions for their gift, such as requiring regular tribute, performing a specific task, or surrendering something of value (material or abstract). This feature ensures that while you elevate others, the balance of power remains in your hands.  
You are no longer simply a benefactor but a Creator of Magical Evolution. You shape the destiny of individuals, fostering the rise of new magical beings and empowering those who may otherwise have remained ordinary. Your gifts can uplift, inspire, and transform entire societies, creating a ripple effect of magical growth.  
However, the conditions you impose ensure that your power is not misused, and that the magic you share comes with a measure of accountability and control. You decide who is worthy of these gifts and at what cost.  
You are not only the Source of Magic but also its Sculptor, crafting a world where magic thrives under your guidance and vision.

Eldritch Magic  
Cost: 8 SP  
You unlock magic made to transcend the boundaries of your reality and draw upon unfathomable, otherworldly powers. With this magic, you can unleash devastating blasts of incomprehensible energy, summon horrifying Eldritch Beasts, and manipulate the fabric of existence in ways that defy human understanding. The extent of these abilities is limited only by your skill and the resilience of your own mind.  
One of the most fearsome aspects of this magic is the ability to create intricate rituals to call upon the Outer Gods themselves. By forging a pact with one of these beings, you may gain its favor and power, effectively making it your patron. However, such rituals are extremely risky. The presence of an Outer God is a catastrophic force in and of itself, and without proper safeguards, you risk annihilation—body, mind, and soul—or worse, becoming a vessel for its inscrutable will.  
The further you immerse yourself in these magics, the more perilous it becomes. The very act of wielding such powers strains the mind and body, and the knowledge itself grows increasingly dangerous as it advances. At higher levels, these eldritch revelations can become memetic in nature, spreading like a virus to others and corrupting them with the same mind-breaking truths. Those who tread this path must do so with caution, for the line between wielding power and succumbing to madness is perilously thin.  
*Alien Influence*  
Required:Occult  
Your mastery of the Occult, combined with the raw power of Eldritch magic, has created a dangerous force. Occult practices like divination, necromancy, and curses are now infused with the alien energy of the Eldritch, elevating them to new and unpredictable heights. Divination unveils not just hidden truths but glimpses of infinite realities, while curses spread madness and corruption like a contagion. Even your tools and rituals have changed, becoming semi-sentient and alive with Eldritch energy, eager to bend reality at your command.  
The fusion of these arts allows you to summon and bind terrifying Eldritch entities through your rituals, weaving together Occult precision and otherworldly chaos. The herbs, sigils, and artifacts you grow and nurture will bear traces of alien influence, granting powers that defy natural law while introducing creeping corruption. Rituals can now reshape landscapes, alter time, or even open rifts to other dimensions, but their success is never guaranteed. The volatile combination of these forces means every act of magic risks catastrophic consequences, from uncontrolled dimensional tears to the wrath of incomprehensible beings.

Mystical Interpretation  
Cost: 10 SP  
You are now able to use stranger, alternative interpretations of magic you own.  
For example: You can now use creation magic to create antimatter, or strange quarks, or even matter with only up or down quarks, breaking the laws of physics. If you’re a necromancer, you can see spirits and souls of every living being, not just humans, including the Neanderthals, dinosaurs and giant insects, or even that of viruses, fungi, plants and bacteria.  
When you create artifacts, instead of a fire spellsword, you can create a sword that spells out the word fire, instead of a cloak of invisibility, you can create an invisible cloak, the interpretation of puns and homonyms.  
You could also crush an air conditioner as an ingredient for potions for the symbolic meaning of circulation of air to cure fevers, or you could also crush a fridge into powder as material for a potion for the same effect. You are also able to use the internet as a transmission point for diseases, and you are able to treat death as sickness to create a cure to death itself. Modern and abstract symbolisms are still symbolism.  
For elemental attributes, you could interpret the western fire, water, air and earth in a more eastern expression, in that of; fire, water, wood, metal, earth. As for how they correspond? It's your interpretation.  
You could make somebody fall into an illusion in a dream, even if that wasn’t their physical form; since they can still talk, act and hit in the same way, then of course it’s plausible that this is the real world, causing somebody to fall into a dream in a dream.  
The laws of magic and its interactions now bend to your interpretations of it.  
*What Do You Mean Magic?*  
Required:(Trump) Completely Mundane  
Your ability to use alternative interpretations of magic and your ability to treat the world as if it were normal synergize, allowing you to treat magic as if it were mundane, and the mundane as if it included magic.  
You can now see and interact with the world around you as if only the interpretations of magic you believe in were in effect, and any magic that doesn't follow your interpretation does not exist to you, and therefore cannot affect you.  
*Interpretation begets Expression*  
Required:Newton's Third Law  
Your ability to use alternative interpretations of magic and your ability to possess alternative and opposite expressions synergize, giving you the ability to transform any magic you own to fit any scenario or situation. If you're unable to find a solution using your magic normally, then use its opposite, if that doesn't work, you can interpret it differently. If that still doesn't work, you can use the opposite of your interpretation, or an interpretation of the magic's opposite expression.  
For example; you can use fire magic, interpreting it as heat magic as fire is just an exothermic reaction that releases energy in the form of heat, then you can use the opposite expression of heat magic, and as heat is just average kinetic energy, and the opposite of that is average potential energy, so now you can use your interpretive expression of fire magic to manipulate gravity.  
*This is Very Scientific*  
Required:Mystery Slayer (Type-Moon)  
Your ability to use alternative expressions of magic and your ability to enforce the physical laws synergize. Now similarly, yet differently with magic, you are able to interpret science. Now, science can truly explain everything, any miracle that happens to you, any phenomena you come across can be explained through science, and as such, be completely reproducible. Of course, some phenomena are harder to understand than most, but now, everything is explainable using science. Such things as "magic" and "mysteries" don't exist, it's all just science, and everything is explainable using the physical laws.

Golemancy  
Cost: 15 SP  
This is the art of infusing inanimate objects with a semblance of life and magic.  
There are various applications to this like making disposable minions capable of simple tasks out of all sorts of materials like dirt, fire, water, air. But you’ll also be able to create what can be described as truly intelligent AI whose programming is made of magic at higher levels.  
The bodies of your golems do not need to be mechanically flexible or capable in order to function, a pure metal statue for example would flex and move like flesh under the direction of your golem magic. This is important because this power comes with no mechanical or engineering knowledge. Though if you do have any abilities that grant you such technological knowledge you’ll find that if your golems that don’t need to use magic moving their bodies they’ll be able to use that extra magic for other things like powering enchantments built into their body or spellcasting.

This power comes paired with a minor regenerating reserve of magic, along with some minor talent for spell crafting and enchanting in general intended to help you advance the capabilities of your golems.  
This talent for spell crafting is genuinely minor meaning you’ll struggle to figure out how to cast a single standard fireball but can easily rapidly build over a dozen average golems which you’ll be able to sustain with your reserve of magical energy.

Your ability to enchant your golems is also quite exceptional even just starting out you’ll be able to give your average golem up to three enchantments that give abilities equivalent to 5 SP powers. Though either you or the golem in question will have to power those enchantments one way or another.  
Intelligent golems you make are able to cast spells that you either pre-programmed them to know or they learned after creation.  
Two qualities determine the strength of a golem and how much magic it can hold. One is the material it’s body is made of; dirt for example will barely be able to handle 1 or 2 SP enchantments meanwhile pure gold makes an excellent golem body able to handle multiple high level enchantments. The second factor is the quality and efficiency of the magical programming of the golem in question.  
If a golem’s programming is awful it won’t matter if it’s body is made out of the best material possible it will be entirely dependent on you for direction being only capable of simple tasks but as you advance your craft you’ll be able to make increasingly complex and independent golems who are even able to generate their one magical energy and think for themselves even if they’re made of dirt. Sufficiently advanced magic programming is also able to slowly start surpassing the limitations imposed by a golem’s material quality, though it’ll be months or even years of effort before you’ll be able to start giving a dirt golem enchantments comparable to higher quality materials.  
Those qualities are only considering your starting capabilities with this magic. You are able to modify the magic programming and body of a golem after its creation.  
There are ways around having to personally supply basic golem’s with energy at every moment, for example you can make them with a magic battery as part of their enchantments. You can also make stations dedicated to passively gathering or generating magical energy that golem’s with magic batteries can be programmed to go to recharge when low on power.

Heart of Runes  
Cost: 25 SP  
You have ignited your Heart of Power, a part physical, part spiritual space that overlaps your heart and soul at the same time. The Heart of Power houses your Core Runes inside of it, your Heart of Power naturally fuels and empowers your body as well, increasing your physical, mental, and spiritual condition at all times. There are three aspects to your Heart of Power's growth, it's Quantity – the maximum quantity of energy you are able to store in your Heart of Power at a time. A higher cap means that you are able to fuel more runes. quality, and rate of recharge. It's Quality – the quality of the energy you are able to store in your Heart of Power. A higher quality of energy means that each Rune is better in every way than a Rune fueled by a lower quality of energy. And it's Rate – the speed it takes for your Heart of Power to go from empty to full.

You are able to receive Wisps of power through a conceptual measure of success when confronted with adversity. The quality of the Wisps received depends entirely on the challenge, facing off against a man with only a knife would grant a lesser quality Wisp in comparison to man wearing a full set of magical armor. Wisps can be used to increase either the Quantity or Quality of your Heart of Power. Alternatively, you are able to improve your Heart of Power’s Quantity, Quality, and Rate through meditation, initially you are only able to improve one of the three at a time. With enough practice you could begin to improve two aspects at a time. Only a true master would be able to improve all three aspects of their Heart of Power at the same time. To ignite your Heart of Power is to bare your being to the world and lay claim to your first Core Rune. Core Runes are concepts, principles, and fundamental truths; these are the runes that are imprinted onto your Heart of Power. Core Runes are what every Runic Chain is built off of. You are able to make minute modifications you make to the Core Runes so they fit your Intent best.

Rune Chains are the spells of this system. These Runes Chains are unique in that they are results of practice and dedication to a combination of runes. Once you have cast a proper combination of runes enough, it can become a singular Rune Chain of its own, separate from the Core Runes that make it up yet also still connected to the growth of the individual runes. You are able to improve both the Rune Chain and the individual Core Runes at the same time.

In order to create more Core Runes, you need to design their image and your understanding of the concept in your Heart of Power. Each design is going to be connected to the meaning of each Core Rune, and you only need to make a Core Rune once for it to be permanent.

Casting using your runes is an incredibly intuitive process. You will be able to project your Core Runes directly onto the world from the start, removing any need to draw them out in the air. As your comprehension of a Rune grows, its design will become increasingly more complicated to represent that amount of understanding that goes into projecting such a vast understanding onto the world.

As you use your Runes, you will find that they grow more detailed and extravagant. This natural growth is sufficient enough for most Runic Mages, however any mage that hopes to be somebody will have to prune the inefficient parts of their Runes. This pruning process isn’t simply about cutting apart parts of your Runes and is instead focused on condensing your comprehension of a rune, finding places of overlap in your knowledge, this reduces the complexity of a rune’s design, allowing you to cast incredibly complex runes at a much faster rate.

Prestiging a Rune is done with more than your comprehension, requiring an incredible feat that has deep personal meaning to you. You are able to begin extracting your Prestige Rune(s) from your Heart of Power. Extracting a Rune crystallizes your comprehension of it, allowing you to express the same power and understanding in a less complex manner. Each time your prestige a rune, it will be pulled further from your Heart of Power and be moved closer to Reality, resting over your heart once you prestige a rune ten times.

Every time you prestige a rune, you are able to select one of three Major Boosts, Quantity, Quality, or Rate. These boosts are qualitatively different from the ones you receive from Wisps of Power. You get to pick another prestige bonus every time you prestige a rune. On the first, third, fifth, seven, and ninth prestiges you will find that you receive a Talent that is well aligned with both the Rune itself and how you use it. The closer a rune is to Reality, the faster you are able to cast it, the less energy it takes to fuel, and the faster it grows. Upon the tenth prestige, you will find that your Prestige Rune no longer needs to be projected from your Heart of Power, requiring no more energy when casting or crafting, as it is in a constant state of existence. Additionally, you receive a Capstone Talent that both grants you a passive ability related to the Rune, and strengthens the Talents earned from earlier prestiges. You are also able to prestige Rune Chains, although this only prestiges the whole Rune Chain and not the individual runes that make it up. If a Rune Chain is composed of one or more Prestige Runes, the effectiveness of the Prestige Rune Chain is qualitatively better.

Art of the Other  
Cost: 25 SP  
Summoning, Bonding, and Binding are fundamentally three branches of one focus; the art of contracting with outside entities. Entities are split into five categories: Servitors, Egregores, Daemons, Fundamentals, and Externals. You can now see, contract, and bind these entities, the only restriction being your own knowledge and energy. Your development and energy is tied to your learning. As you begin to unravel the mechanics of different entities, you’ll be able to achieve greater and greater heights. Starting out, you will be able to summon minor Daemons and bond with fundamentals under strict contacts, but with time and experience you will become a master of the Art, weaving contracts and forces as second nature to you.

Servitors are entities created by an individual summoner, often for a singular purpose. Be that acting as a familiar, or in menial roles like timers or page turners. Being created by a summoner themselves out of their own energy reserves, they are often highly specialized, and as a result deficient in all other areas. A talented Summoner may be able to create a physically strong and capable Servitor far outstripping a human, but it would require a large amount of energy and the being would be possessed of no will or intelligence of its own, blindly following its creator’s orders to the letter.

Egregores are entities created by collective thoughts; often sourced from religions, mythologies and any figure that people funnel their faith and belief into. Comparatively to Servitors they are quite powerful, even if they do not reach the level of true gods. They derive power from the same energy they’re sourced by, often seeing the act of spreading their influence as morally correct. The power of an Egregore is directly correlated to the amount of belief and faith they consume. A local Egregore, known to very few devoted followers may be able to only summon small fires, while the conglomerated faith of a major religion could create an Egregore capable of creating vast firestorms with no strain.

Daemons are agents of the world, spirits, and entities that exist without human interference or belief. Commonly cited Daemons include fire and the ocean. Daemons, much like Egregores, scale in strength to their domain, but unlike Egregores they are not tied to humans and can theoretically persist separate from them eternally. A Daemon has complete control over their domain, but it will only act in accordance with itself. A fire cannot extinguish itself from nowhere, but it can choose how it grows and spreads. The Daemon of fire therefore has complete control over the element and everything contained within it, and is powerful to match; but incapable of fundamentally altering it. They also have their own internal structure, with Daemons of specific objects and locations deferring to their grander cousins. For instance, the Daemons of the seas, atlantic, mediterranean and further would all defer to the aforementioned Daemon of oceans.

Fundamentals are entities so intrinsic to reality that conceptualising them as entities is often foreign to non-summoners like Gravity and Time. They are difficult to control and bargain with due to their range and power, but truly embody the concepts they represent. Even the most powerful Daemon cannot truly affect the nature of its domain, while the ‘weakest’ Fundamental of entropy could completely stop its presence in a certain area, or permanently accelerate its pace on certain areas or figures.

Externals are beings completely outside reality, incomprehensible to and uncomprehending of those within its confines. They are completely alien in thought, action, and desire, and as such cannot be classified. Each can be equivalent to varying levels of entity, featuring only commonality in how unlike anything else in reality they are. General Externals vary from other-dimensional beings that cannot comprehend existence isolated to four dimensions, to Daemons of alternate worlds with physics so aberrant that they cannot be understood in the terms of their brethren.

Summoning is a discipline focused around calling these entities forth. The level of variance however is within the entities preferred by the summoner. A summoner can deal with Daemons for specific benefits, contract with larger Egregores, or summon temporary Servitors for specific purposes all within this branch of the art. The presentations of these can vary greatly, a Summoner who calls Gravity into an anomalous crushing force still contracts with a Fundamental.

Bonding however, is a summoning discipline rarely practiced by the academics studying the art. Bonding centrally allows you to form a connection with a singular entity, gaining a greater access and understanding of them and the domain they exist within. By bonding with an Egregore for instance, the great feats attributed to them are within your grasp, while bonding with a Fundamental would allow you to twist their domain as much as your skill allows. Bonding with a Fundamental of Gravity, for instance, would give you intrinsic control over local gravity, but eventually you could train this skill and learn to affect the pull of the stars themselves, though this would require great energy and learning. However, it completely warps not only your form, but also makes you unable to summon, bind or bond any other entities. You can unbond from an entity, but doing so can unleash its effects on the environment temporarily, potentially causing massive damage depending on the specific entity you bonded with. In addition, unbonding it will scour its influence from your mind, bringing you back to the level of Summoning skill you had before bonding yourself to it. As a consequence, if you ever wish to bond to the same entity you will have to relearn its influence from scratch.

Binding meanwhile, is similar in its restriction from other Summoning techniques, but it externalizes the force. Binding a Daemon to yourself ensures its service and assistance, but you do not gain benefits from its form or purpose. You can still use the Art and even Bond while Binding is in effect. In addition, when severing a Binding (which can be done on either side of the arrangement barring either extreme preparation or skill), the Summoner retains all skill in the art they gained at the cost of having less control over the entity's interpretation and action than they would have when Bonding.

Divination  
Cost: 10 SP  
You are now a master of divination magic and have a talent in all its aspects, which ranges from the simplest of detection spells all the way to viewing the future with clarity. The main way of casting divination magic is through the use of ritualistic magic, which typically has long incantations and requires certain preparations. Some basic forms of divination magic can require little to no incantations or rituals, but rituals and incantations can make them more accurate. Divination magic is divided into three main categories: past, present, and future. Beings who have strong supernatural senses can sense when someone is divining them (directly or indirectly) and if they are significantly stronger or more skilled than you even block it.

Past-based divination isn’t as widely known or used but typically involves divining an area and seeing what recently happened. The farther into the past you want to look, the cloudier and harder it gets.

Present-based divination is by far the most common and widely used. This type of divination is mainly used to detect someone in an area, improve your senses, find something, and scrying another area. This category of divination usually is less strict and requires fewer incantations or preparation.

Future-based divination is by far the most well-known and hardest type of divination. This divination gives some type of information about the future. The accuracy of your findings using future divination is based on multiple things, which include the importance of the event, your magical power, your skill, and most importantly, how far into the future you wish to know about. The less important the information and the farther in the future you wish to know, the less accurate your information is. Even the most accurate future divination magic is vague.

Lastly, you will also learn spells and how to defend against divination-based magic.  
*Fortune Teller*  
Required:Occult  
You have now mastered the most basic forms of divination magic and learned to hone them to a very high extent. This includes, but is not limited to, using a crystal ball, tarot cards, palm readings, and you have even learned to act like a medium. You also now excel at using rituals to assist in your divination magic, along with the ability to use magic to prepare the area to make your divination more effective. Lastly, as a result of your namesake, you gain a natural talent for improvisation and cold reading.

You have also been granted magically conductive implements for your basic divinations.  
*Fate Weaver*  
Required:Weaver of Destinies  
Through interacting with the Threads of Destiny, you have elevated yourself beyond the level of a mere divination mage. You are a seer, and your connection to the future is nigh absolute, making all your future divinations impossible to block or sense, excluding those connected, or disconnected, to fate itself. Not only that, but future divinations are now far easier to do and more accurate. 

Through this connection to the future, you can now naturally gain visions of important events in the near future. This also makes you naturally slightly precognitive, which manifests in a gut instinct of the future. 

Lastly, you have gained a unique and powerful ability—the ability to alter someone's fate itself. By viewing someone's thread of destiny and applying magical energy, you may change the major event in question. At first, you don't have control over how the event actually changes, but with time, you may learn to lean it in a more positive or negative direction. But the more you use this on someone, the harder it will be to use it again, and the more resistant they become to your seer abilities. Overuse on someone in a short period of time may result in them gaining a chaotic fate for a period of time, which makes their threads intangible and invisible to you, along with them being more likely to encounter a good fortune or profound misfortune.

Chaos Magic  
Cost: 10 SP  
Your magic stems from the wild, underlying forces of Chaos that shape the foundation of reality. Chaos represents both the origin of everything and the realm of infinite possibilities. As a conduit to this primordial force, you wield the power to bring forth its might.

Chaos Magic is one of the most ancient forms of magic, existing freely of the rules and traditions that bind other magics. Your spells are direct extensions of your will, and require no hand signs or incantations—merely a direction for guiding chaos into form. With a mere snap of your fingers, you could extinguish the sun or vanquish gods. Oppositely, the same spell could morph you into a flesh-eating blob, teleport you into Hell, or charm every penguin in the world.

As a conduit of primordial chaos, you can vaguely guide the intensity and direction of your spells. However, mastering the fluctuations of chaos magic is extremely difficult; even a minor misstep could lead to a minor cantrip turning into a city-breaking calamity. For Chaos mages calamity or death will always be knocking on your doorstep.

Attempting to impose order on Chaos is futile. So each spell you cast, whether to ignite a match or curse an opponent, carries the risk of a misfire. These could be mere nuisances or lethal mistakes, no chaos spell will ever follow your orders perfectly.

Chaos is disorderly, volatile, and often verges on madness, but its chaotic potential can accomplish anything—as long as you are willing to roll the dice.  
*Favored Child of Chaos*  
Required:Eliminate the Negative  
Congratulations, you have a better connection with Chaos than most across the Omniverse\! As a favored child of Chaos, your own Chaos Spells can no longer directly inconvenience, harm, or kill you—unless you desire it. You also have the power to shield those you choose from the effects of your chaos spells, though be aware: only you are the favored child, and each protective attempt increases the risks for those you protect.

While chaos cannot act directly against you, it has plenty of indirect ways to complicate your life. Enjoy wading through your bedroom transmuted turned tundras, fleeing from dragons you've unwittingly summoned, or dealing with a charmed Cthulhu you accidentally romanced. Although you are shielded from direct harm by your spells, the indirect consequences of chaos can still lead you to your doom.  
Guide the Tide  
Cost: 5 SP  
Required:Chaos Magic  
Chaos is a sea of possibilities, a true vortex of madness and disorder. However, your deep experience with the great Chaos has granted you the insight to guide it subtly. While Chaos cannot be ordered, you have mastered four guides to channel your Chaos spells: Attack, Defend, Move, and Control. These four broad concepts are the best way to direct chaos to achieve your desired effects.

Using any of these concepts, you can consistently steer your chaotic spells within these constraints. But, the specific effect and scale still remains chaotically bound. For instance, imbuing a Chaos spell with the concept of 'Attack' might manifest in diverse ways: it could be as harmless as a dodgeball to the face, as soul-shattering as revealing secret desires to break an opponent's mind, as annoyingly painful as summoning rubbing alcohol on every open wound, or you could even summon an elephant on top of them.  
Wild Revolver  
Cost: 5 SP  
Required:Chaos Magic  
Your connection with Chaos has been refined, allowing you to channel Chaos spells with even greater focus. You now possess six metaphorical 'bullets' that give direction to your Chaos spells. Each bullet ensures that your chaos spell will act within a specific direction to a certain extent. For example, a bullet used for fire will always produce fire, but the exact type—be it nuclear fire, hellfire, or sparkling glitter fire—is still left to chance. The more you try to constrain a chaos spell, the more likely it is to backfire in unexpected ways. The vaguer, the better.

These six bullets can also be used to handle any misfires. If you cast a misfire or simply dislike the outcome of your most recent spell, you can sacrifice a bullet to nullify it. However, this can only affect the spell you've most recently cast. If you wish to undo a baleful polymorph or a charmed mind flayer spell you cast months ago, good luck. Indirect consequences of your spells aren't nullified either so don't think you can get away scot free if you accidentally summon Godzilla on top of the White House.

The revolver's bullets replenish at a rate of one bullet every 10 minutes but frequent casting of Chaos spells will enhance your reload time. With time and practice, you can gain more 'bullets' to direct your chaos spells more effectively.

Celestial Current  
Cost: 25 SP  
Long ago, an ancient civilization sought to use the energy of a dying star to empower their race and escape their inevitable demise. Their brightest minds worked together and found a way to infuse aether \- a special type of solar energy, into their very bodies. They managed to transfer a portion of their consciousness into a state of living, hyperdense aether which was able to transmit information back to their bodies. They named this new form of existence the soul.  
Utilizing their newfound souls, they were able to achieve a variety of spectacular effects. Aether was an extremely potent and versatile form of energy capable of interacting with and even diluting into a variety of particles. Through careful calculations and mastery of physics, a formula could be created. A formula is an extremely specific series of actions involving manipulation, flow, and transfer of aether in order to create an effect on the physical world.

The most basic formula is manifesting aether externally in an unstable state to rapidly fire beams of scorching hot aether. However, from this foundation, more complex formulas can be developed, allowing for intermediate uses such as elemental control, teleportation, telekinesis, and flight equivalent to your maximum running speed.  
Advanced users of aether have extreme fine control of the energy, and can utilize the continuous transfer of aether between their soul and body to achieve effects such as complete and rapid regeneration of the body and reinforcing the body (and weapons) with aether. At the theoretical height of aether manipulation lies the ability to control the very fabrics of the world, shaping time and creating aetherial stars with ease.

Aether is capable of assimilating other energies and forms of mana into itself, gaining their properties and capabilities. Though it is important to be careful, as you are essentially modifying the fabric of your own soul when you do this.  
You start at the level of a beginner mage, capable of materialising aether rays and some basic forms of elemental manipulation. Your mind is enhanced to the level of a high-end computer in order to facilitate this level of aether use. Your soul passively generates aether for your use, but you can convert other forms of energy such as radiation and sunlight into aether, which will replenish your reserves. Regularly absorbing external aether can increase your maximum capacity \-- if you somehow survive an extended stay at the core of a star your aether regeneration and reserves will become monstrous.  
(With enough time you can do anything with this power)

Tattoo Genesis  
Cost: 25 SP  
You possess a unique form of magic that harnesses the power of tattoos, allowing you to create and draw strength from them. Your magical reservoir can be channeled to either craft new tattoos or activate existing ones. The complexity and size of a tattoo directly correlate with the energy required for its creation or activation.

For instance, a simple snake tattoo on your arm might grant you the ability to summon a serpent, while a full-body dragon tattoo could potentially enable you to transform into a dragon. The type of power you gain from the tattoo is dependent on your understanding of what the tattoo symbolises, for example you may gain the power to control fire from a fire tattoo, while others may gain the power to summon fire spirits.

If your energy reserves are insufficient, the magic will draw from other sources, including your life force if necessary. Additionally, you have the ability to bestow tattoos upon others, sharing your powers with them.  
If you have other powers you can imbue them into your tattoos.  
*Infinite Recursion*  
Required:Brand & Bond  
recursive text on the inside of an O. Forever dOwnwards.Forever dOwnwards.

Your tattoos as created with Tattoo Genesis have fused with the Brand & Bond, allowing you to will your tattoos into smaller and more complex forms. The size of your tattoos can now be greatly compressed, compensating for the lack of size with recursive detail.

Codex Esoterica  
Cost: 25 SP  
You have the ability to summon an extra-dimensional scroll of power and knowledge and unsummon it at any time.  
Within this scroll of magic you find a nearly endless collection of magical systems of all different varieties and potencies, while there is a wide variety of systems that are contained within this single scroll all of them follow a similar pattern in several ways.  
The magic systems of this scroll all have some amount of power progression, reaching higher levels of mastery and effectiveness through study and practical work in the system.  
The Magic systems work off of internal principles or laws that can be studied and understood allowing the dedicated to progress far. There could be the laws of Mana interactions or an elemental cycle that can be studied and modelled accurately. The level of detail and depth of the fields of study are determined by the strength and depth of the magic system itself. This restriction doesn't mean that all of the magical systems are highly scientific or "physical" just that there are actual rules and internal logic that has to be followed for it to work.

If the Magic system needs some form of special trait or condition that you do not have, the system will have a method to develop them. This might mean that the early stages of progression in a system require you to work only on developing those special traits, but all of the magic systems can be progressed through your hard work and dedication.

For a magic system with external resource needs they might rely on specialized magic sub-systems for a specific external resource, multiple magic systems might use the same or similar sub-systems. External resources don't have to be consumable, and could be something like a magical Foci.  
While a lot of magic systems use some kind of internal energy source, not all of them do some take the form of spell slots, or even Trading card game like cards, however in some way there will be a resource economy that means your system has some form of limits that requires intelligent management .

You begin with one magic system for free that would be the equivalent of 20sp power, this would be at the high end of street level powers, as you study and further your understanding of your current magic system you build up energy within the scroll. The energy is expended to check out another magic system.  
While actively studying and practicing with your magic system you have access to a Tutor that is focused on the specific Magic system you are studying. This tutor isn't sapient or sentient and while it can act with specifically chosen personality and mannerisms, it doesn't know much else beyond its magic system. The tutor is specifically enchanted to be able to figure out methods of teaching that actually work for you. The Tutor cannot be used to shortcut your work or path to power.
