This dimension mirrors the real world you currently inhabit but stands devoid of any inhabitants except yourself. Time holds no sway in this realm, ensuring that you remain unaffected by the passage of time while within it. Any mirror in your world serves as a portal to enter and exit this dimension.  
This reflective world is intricately connected to the real one. Every action you undertake in this mirrored dimension has a corresponding effect in the real world, should you choose it to be so.  
Your control over this dimension allows you to manipulate not only inanimate objects but also the bodies of living beings reflected within it. You can commandeer the reflection of a car, steering it without physically occupying the driver's seat, or manipulate a rock and propel it in any chosen direction. The only constraint to this ability is that the subject must be reflected in a mirror first before you can assume control. Additionally, if the mirror through which you establish control is destroyed, your influence over the subject will be severed.

Master of the Trapezohedron's  
Cost: 45 SP  
Rejoice\! You have been chosen and blessed by The Shining Trapezohedron. Through a twisted connection with your shadow, you have become the Warden of a prison that holds a nightmarish horde of creatures that sing with the discordant tunes of madness. Your very being serves as a gateway to a prison realm located beyond space and time, where unspeakable horrors from beyond eagerly await your commands to cast their shadow in the world once more.  
As the Warden of eldritch horrors, you command the ability to summon and temporarily release these otherworldly beings. From the depths of your shadow, they emerge, tendrils of darkness intertwining with their grotesque forms. Their presence instills fear and despair in all who witness their existence. Once they have completed their objectives, they are drawn back into your shadow, for they can never be truly free unless you allow it. At the start you will only be able to summon weaker creatures, such as Night-Gaunts, and Deep Ones, but in time you will be able to call upon the might of even gods.  
Within the prison realm, you possess absolute control, shaping it according to your will. It is through your shadow, a gateway to this twisted realm, that you can seal the fates of others. With a mere touch, you can push individuals into the prison, subjecting them to the horrors that lurk within.

Inside the prison realm, your accelerated healing abilities ensure swift recovery from any wounds, while simultaneously halting the aging process of your body. Additionally, you hold dominion over time, granting you the power to choose whether it flows normally or becomes frozen in the outside world.  
Furthermore, you have attained immunity to the sanity-damaging effects inflicted by eldritch forces. Their mind-shattering influence has no hold over you, leaving you unaffected by their torment.  
*Shackles of Subjugation*  
Required:Fictitious Dreams of The Kings of Feys  
Your eldritch patron has metamorphosed into the binding chain that tethers other eldritch creatures, enabling the summoning of higher-level entities under its dominion. These creatures, restrained by your patron's power, heed your call and serve your will. Their already formidable abilities bolstered by your patron's, extending your dominion over the eldritch forces. With these Chains, your patron becomes an instrument of control, granting access to more potent beings and solidifying your influence over the prison realm. Balance power and command as you navigate this newfound dominion.

Fictitious Dreams of The Kings of Feys  
Cost: 30 SP  
Within the depths of your own shadow resides an enigmatic and ancient entity—an eldritch presence that becomes your patron, bestowing fragments of its immense power while cautioning against the overwhelming influence of eldritch energies that your mortal form cannot fully endure.  
As the eldritch patron manifests its powers through your shades, your own shadow becomes a conduit, pulsating with interwoven eldritch energies, the sound of skittering madness, and the otherworldly fractal of unreality.

Being an outsider to reality, your patron possesses mastery over the manipulation of reality itself. Probability bends to its command, allowing it to shape and influence events within the boundaries of possibility. This power echoes the enigmatic nature of Marble Phantasms, enabling the manifestation of phenomena that surpass conventional understanding.

Gifted with clairvoyance, your eldritch patron enhances your perception and grants you glimpses into the threads of fate. You become attuned to hidden truths and potential outcomes, surpassing the limitations of mortal senses.

Embracing your patron's essence, you become a conduit of both incredible potential and great vulnerability. Your mortal body struggles to contain the overwhelming influx of eldritch energy.  
The eldritch patron's ultimate power, Chaoskampf, stands as a testament to its dominion over the blurred boundaries of reality. With this power, your patron fully emerges from your shadow and destabilises the superstructure of the cosmos, expanding the divide between truth and falsehood, fact and fiction. Allowing your patron to denote and redefine what can and cannot be.  
Additionally, you can choose the background of your relationship with your patron. E.g perhaps the patron may have fallen in love with you, hence why it has chosen to become your patron.  
*Eternal Union*  
Required:Eternal Flame  
Through profound communion, your bond with the eldritch patron becomes eternal, granting easier access to immense power and seamless manifestations. The essence of your souls intertwine, forging an unbreakable connection, impervious to hindrance.  
The flowing of eldritch energies become fluid, empowering actions and augmenting all your abilities effortlessly. Your patrons manifestations require less strain, revealing heightened clarity and interaction. The strengthened bond ensures eternal attachment, safeguarding against all severance or negativity. This unbreakable link ensures perpetual support, drawing upon the patron's power and guidance without fear of loss

Words of Power  
Cost: 25 SP  
You have a way with words. Maybe you can shout in the ancient tongue of dragons (“FUS RO DAH\!”), work magic through rhymes, are fluent in the original language of man or just speak so forcefully the world has to listen. Whatever the source, you can change reality just by spelling. In general, the more words, the larger or more complicated the effect, though don’t expect your enemies to sit back while you rattle off a soliloquy to finish them off. This ability starts off moderately and gets stronger gradually, allowing you to accomplish more with fewer words.

The Dealmaker  
Cost: 30 SP  
You possess the ability to deal with people, granting them supernatural powers and abilities in exchange for something. It can be as low as a simple rock or as high as complete and utter obedience to yourself.  
You can grant someone a superpower, unlock the potential hidden within their minds, or allow them to channel magic. Your physical, mental, and spiritual strength determines how many deals you can make and how strong the abilities you grant can be. An average human could make one deal per week before they have to rest for the remainder of the week, and the power it would grant would be limited to the equivalent of 5 SP. A human with Olympic potential could make one deal per three days, and it would be limited to 10 SP and so on.  
(The power you grant can either be permanent or, if you make it clear in the deal, be temporary, lasting from days to months to even years if you wish for it.)  
*The Gift Giver*  
Cost: 20 SP  
Required:The Dealmaker  
You are no longer required to make a deal to give powers, and you are now capable of giving yourself powers, though it will be half as effective as giving others powers. You are also no longer limited here to just giving. One power at a time, and the strength of the powers you give is no longer connected to your physical, mental, and spiritual strength; rather, in the beginning, you are given 10 SP worth of power and guaranteed a growth of 1 SP per month for the first 50 months; after that, any growth must be achieved through training and pushing your power to its limits repeatedly.  
You are not limited in the number of powers you can give, but you cannot give conflicting powers unless you're willing to risk either the death of the subject or the total and permanent loss of power of the one you're giving powers to. You also possess the capability of imbuing objects with powers, though in the beginning it is limited to one per object, and after 50 months you will be able to imbuing objects with three powers.  
You are capable of upgrading powers that you have given, but they must follow the path of evolution for that power, and you cannot create a power by upgrading a pre-existing power, nor can you upgrade a power beyond the amount of SP you currently have.  
For powers that require knowledge, you will automatically create the knowledge and give it to the individuals alongside their power, and you can make it so that the powers you give can grow in strength with training and experimentation at the cost of them being slightly weaker in the beginning.  
(You're able to choose whether Giftgiver can create powers that affect itself; if so, the powers will cost at least 60 SP and require a larger amount of concentration and focus to create, or whether Giftgiver is incapable of creating powers that affect itself.)

Memetic Sensitivity  
Cost: 17 SP  
You possess a continuous awareness of all entities that hold information about you. You can perceive their presence, whether they be written records, individuals, or even organizations. This awareness acts as a radar, alerting you to their existence and allowing you to discern the depth and nature of the information they hold about you.  
Additionally, you gain insight into any and all entities proportional to the volume and specificity of the information they possess about you. The more extensive and detailed their knowledge, the greater your awareness of them grows.

Golden One  
Cost: 10 SP  
You can create and manipulate any kind of money, currency and wealth, be it notes, coins, gold, jewels and anything that is currently used as currency (even digital currencies like bitcoin). However, this power does not work on goods used for barter. With this power you will never be poor. Do try not to crash the world economy.

Dolos (Bleach)  
Cost: 25 SP  
You now possess the ability to skillfully manifest nigh flawless illusions. Your mastery over the faculties that shape one's perception of reality is unparalleled, enabling you to induce a state of near complete hypnosis in anyone subject to your manipulation. You can project diverse shapes and forms, manipulate the perception of time in those within your vicinity, or envelop them in profound darkness by impeding their senses. With sufficient expertise, you can even construct an entire lifetime for them within a matter of seconds. The potential applications of these powers are limited only by the boundaries of your imagination.  
While the illusions you create wield significant potency, individuals of considerable power and proficiency themselves may discern subtle disparities between the illusions and reality, although they may struggle to pinpoint the exact nature of these discrepancies. The definitive means to wholly dispel these illusions is either through physical contact with you by those ensnared within them, or through your death.

Divine Protection (Re:Zero)  
Cost: 40 SP  
The possessor of this extraordinary ability has the power to acquire any Divine Protection they desire in specific situations and retain them permanently. These Divine Protections are granted by an entity known as Od Laguna (The World), which can even create new Divine Protections that have never existed before. However, there is a chance of miscommunication, leading to the recipient not receiving the intended Divine Protection accurately. This ability is independent of any other inherent powers and allows the user to erase Divine Protections if desired.  
Divine Protections are unique blessings bestowed upon individuals at birth by the world, though most people lack them. Certain races possess inherent Divine Protections, granting special abilities. The ratio of holders varies. These blessings encompass a wide range of effects, like reading the wind or emotions, enhancing physical abilities, or providing elemental protection and much more. They can evolve and differ slightly among users with the same Protection. Certain magical methods can temporarily remove them. If two Protections clash, they nullify each other.

Eternal Blessing  
Cost: 15 SP  
You have the power to single out an individual and subject them to a consistent influx of good luck, its intensity increasing with time. The target will experience minor bouts of fortune, such as finding money or avoiding minor accidents, which eventually escalate to major strokes of luck, such as winning a lottery or surviving a life-threatening situation unscathed. The luck chain doesn't end there though as each stroke of fortune attracts more good luck, increasing the probability of prosperous events in the future, similar to a snowball effect.  
With practice, you could learn to control the level of the Blessing's effects, dictating how much of the luck should go to the victim or those around them. You could choose to spread it out like a contagious aura, imbuing the surroundings with good luck, or concentrate it on a particular individual or object for prolonged periods.  
The power is always active and cannot be revoked, but you could retarget the target often to prevent the effect from reaching its maximum potential, ensuring more consistent returns of good luck. Other forms of protection or similar forms of luck powers could delay the luck's potency, but ultimately the Blessing's luck chain would overpower them, allowing the target to continue their streak of good fortune.  
*Lady Luck*  
Required:Eternal Malediction  
Oh, it seems like your control is no longer limited to simply targeting an individual. Eternal Malediction and Eternal Blessings have granted you the power of Lady Luck herself. Your control has been greatly increased, able to now turn your power off, target multiple individuals and can now target yourself, and you even possess the ability to control the intensity and how quickly, if it does, change.

Eternal Malediction  
Cost: 33 SP  
You have the power to single out a chosen individual and subject them to a whirlwind of ill fortune. From minor mishaps to catastrophic accidents, bad luck envelops the victim, its intensity escalating ceaselessly, weaving an inescapable web of despair. This effect starts out on par with the 'Eventful Day' drawback and grows comparable to 'Worst Day' in about a day. This is far from the end though as there is no limit to how far the cruel hand of destiny will reach in order to torment its target. In time even some of the greatest horrors of the omniverse will be attracted to the victim.  
With time and practice you could learn how to control the level of consequences suffered by those near the target. Either focus it precisely, leaving any bystanders miraculously unharmed, or spread it out inflicting untold devastation to the surroundings while leaving the target itself untouched. If left uncontrolled, both the victim and their surroundings suffer the full brunt of this malediction.  
This power is always active, but the danger it represents can be mitigated by retargeting it often, preventing its effect from growing too potent. Alternative means of defense, including powers related to luck or destiny, may serve to postpone any misfortune, but they will eventually be overwhelmed as more and more esoteric effects are brought to bear in escalation.

Sucker For Love  
Cost: 25 SP  
Death and despair were once deemed inevitable when courting ancient gods, but prepare to have your expectations shattered. Pursuing the affections of eldritch deities will no longer be your downfall. Even amidst horrifying transformations, you will not meet your end. If you succeed in captivating an otherworldly being and remain in their thoughts, your relationship will persist eternally, with every return and refresh.  
But that's not all\! Love, lust, or any emotions in between have bestowed upon you an unparalleled resilience. In the face of eldritch horrors, your mind remains unbroken, your will unwavering. The eldritch's influence struggles to drive you to madness. Though the abyss may give you pause, you still have the audacity to leap into the unknown, confident of a safe landing. With time, you can stand before elder gods, boldly mocking their malevolence.  
By merely seeking for it, forbidden knowledge and esoteric secrets will serendipitously find their way into your hands. Whether it be a tome of counter-evils or a hidden compendium of rituals, invaluable wisdom becomes readily available. The grimoire from your enraged eldritch aunt may contain the very rituals necessary to ward her off, or the seemingly counterfeit Necronomicon might surpass expectations. The universe conspires to arm you with the tools you need.  
In the climax, the eldritch gods themselves are left in awe and perplexity. As they dream of you, their expectations crumble under your defiance. Your mere presence disrupts their balance, amplifying your resolve with each act of resistance. Engage in a heated argument with a deity over the nature of your servitude and find yourself unexpectedly married. Unleash fear upon their elder, rousing her from nightmarish slumber. This power transcends boundaries, affecting most deities and supernatural beings, allowing you to triumph through sheer determination, leaving these entities in disarray.

Flames of Purgatory (Code: Breaker)  
Cost: 20 SP  
You've gain the hereditary power of Code: Emperor. This power allows you to utilize any of seven demonic flames, representing the seven deadly sins. Each flame possesses unique properties, they are all spiritual in nature, allowing you to manipulate souls and hellfire in countless ways.

\- Satan’s Blaze: A blue flame fueled by the spirits of sinners. It cannot be extinguished and burns hot enough to destroy gene fragments and melt steel. This wrathful flame can engulf someone, burning them down to their very soul.

\- Belphegor, the "Blaze of Limbo": A pitch-black flame that nullifies supernatural powers and their effects. However, it cannot damage physical abilities.

\- Mammon, the "Dichromatic Twin Flame of the Netherworld": Two flames in one—a blazing hot blue flame and a freezing cold yellow flame. Together, they create devastating winds and explosions capable of destroying half a building in an instant.

\- Beelzebub, the "Achromatic Catharsis Flame of Purgatory": A completely invisible flame that cloaks its user. It can be launched into the air, transforming into a downpour of invisible 1500-degree flames from above.

\- Leviathan, the "Argenteous Phantom Flame of Hades": A silver flame that severs all matter, behaving like a sword rather than burning. It steals heat from targets, freezing them solid.

\- Asmodeus, the "Iridescent Explosive Flame of Hell": Flames that burn in various colors, trapping targets in illusions of their desires. It can ignite surrounding minerals, triggering devastating explosions.

\- Lucifer: The final flame, available only after mastering all six other flames. It takes the form of an upgraded Satan's Blaze. With Lucifer, you can use all the flames together without conflict. You can even merge all seven flames to produce a powerful flame capable of burning the impossible, even "nothingness."

Lunar Dial (Touhou)  
Cost: 50 SP  
You have some serious power over the flow of time. Through manipulating time, you can speed yourself up relative to everything else, enabling you to act far, far faster than any human could react, or turn it towards mundane uses such as aging a planted seed to see it rapidly mature into a tree, quickly aging fine wines, or freezing a volley of bullets in midair in order to evade it. From halting time completely to reversing its course, you are a master of time. Finally, since time is intertwined with space, after significant progression of your powers, you may find yourself being able to alter space itself by manipulating time in certain ways.  
Your command and mastery over time and consequently space can be considered absolute. The only limit being reversing time which depends upon the laws of physics governing the specific universe in which you operate. Otherwise there are virtually no limits to your power.

I Mark The Spot\! (Spiderverse)  
Cost: 20 SP  
You've gained the incredible gift to create inky black portals that serve as gateways to anywhere your mind can visualise. The very fabric of space and time bends to your will as you manipulate these interdimensional openings.  
Picture it—a gesture of your hand, a thought in your mind, and a portal materialises before your eyes, swirling with chaotic energy. Step through and find yourself transported to distant lands, alternate dimensions, and even parallel universes. The possibilities are nearly boundless as you navigate through the vast tapestry of existence, discovering new worlds and encountering extraordinary beings.  
However, traversing these gateways does initially pose a challenge, as the multidimensional terrain can be treacherous and disorienting. But fear not, for with time and experience, your mastery over this power will grow, allowing you to navigate the cosmic labyrinth with increasing finesse. One day, the entirety of the multiverse will become your playground, a vast expanse of wonder and adventure at your fingertips.  
But that's not all. When pushed to the brink of life or death, or when faced with immense stress, you temporarily transcend your mortal form, becoming a being crafted from swirling, inky black portals. Space-Time warps around you, fractal patterns dancing in your wake as you gain absolute control over temporal and spatial dimensions near you. In this state, the rules of the universe are merely guidelines you can easily break.  
Through dedicated training and honing your abilities, accessing this form will become second nature to you, as the boundaries of what is possible shatters.

Skeleton Key  
Cost: 15 SP  
You have the power to unlock and lock anything you can imagine, from unlocking the secrets of an ancient tomb, opening gates to different dimensions, or even unlocking someone's hidden potential. This power can also be used in reverse to do things such as locking away someone's memories, making areas completely inaccessible, and imprisoning others by locking them away.

Diminishing Returns  
Cost: 30 SP  
Within the intricacies of decision-making, cognition, and behavioural patterns lie the omnipresent presence of percentages and probabilities. You possess the ability to exert influence and direct manipulation over this phenomenon through a mechanism known as "Diminishing Returns." This power autonomously detects and scans the surrounding environment, identifying any potentially malicious or harmful elements, even those borne solely from intent, and introduces a diminishing return to their impact.  
Imagine a fireball spell that gradually loses all its potency and effectiveness after the third casting, or a sword swing that progressively slows down until it comes to an eventual halt after the third strike. Consider the adversary who, upon taking their third step towards you, finds their legs inexplicably frozen, inhibiting their pursuit. This power permeates every facet of life until the targeted aspects are rendered obsolete, nullifying their influence entirely.  
The effects of diminishing returns operate automatically, though you possess the agency to toggle its functionality entirely or selectively apply it to specific individuals or objects. With time and practice, you can refine your control, honing the ability to single out particular attributes or aspects on which you wish the diminishing returns to manifest their effect.

Genre Shifter: Boundless Imagination  
Cost: 40 SP  
This power grants you the ability to harness the essence of genres and bend them to your will. You can seamlessly alter the world around you, twisting and shaping it into different genres of your choosing. Want to turn a medieval fantasy world into a futuristic cyberpunk haven? Done. Craving a romantic comedy in a post-apocalyptic setting? Consider it done. You have the power to mix, match, or create genres to create a captivating and ever-changing story. Your imagination knows no bounds, and through your power, you can create immersive and exhilarating adventures for yourself and those around you. With each new genre you introduce, the world transforms, offering fresh challenges, twists, and experiences to keep your journey endlessly exciting.

Farmer  
Cost: 10 SP  
Farmer allows the user to grow crops of exceptional quality even in subpar circumstances. As the user cultivates their crops, these plants can develop various magical traits that correspond to the individual's abilities. Additionally, the user can communicate with their plants, encouraging their growth and showing them love and affection akin to the way a parent would care for their child. Overall, this power not only provides a means of obtaining valuable products, but it also gives the user the opportunity to nurture and connect with nature.  
*Alchemical Plots*  
Required:Sovereign of Alchemy  
You can now designate a specific amount of land, scaling with your proficiency in farming, for cultivating alchemical ingredients. Whatever you grow in said plots is now optimized for its intended purpose. For example, Blue Mountain Flower and Wheat used for a (Skyrim) Healing Potion will have its positive effects increased by a factor of two, and completely negate possible side effects. Creations meant to be harmful or negative in nature will still qualify for the boost since that was the intended purpose.  
*Menagerie*  
Required:Animal Tamer  
Your power over animals and farming have conjoined into a greater whole. All animals become much easier to tame, with the animals of the same species you’ve tamed before, becoming almost effortless. Any tamed animals grow to adulthood quicker, breed quicker, and have a much shorter gestation length, as well as having their natural constitution improve. Tamed animals designated as livestock will produce significantly more harvestable materials. Tamed animals designated as pets, companions, or familiars now experience a larger boost to all attributes.  
*Farming Simulator*  
Required: (Trump) Gamer System, or Gamer System  
After having acquired a system alongside a dedicated power for farming, your system has now evolved with specially designated abilities to help you on your capitalistic conquering of the agricultural market. First and foremost, what this synergy allows for is perfect awareness and measurement of the crops you are cultivating in specifically claimed areas through a UI menu, such as growth rate, total growth, any particular issues in growing, etc.  
Alongside that first ability is a flat percentage increase to growth speed, harvesting speed, crop resilience, and crop yield that scales with your system’s total farming proficiency.  
Last but not least, your system now has a supernatural agriculture shop filled with items and static effects that increase crop yield, automatically harvest crops, etc.  
(If this is taken in parallel with the addon Mystical Agriculture then you are able to apply all effects towards traditionally non-farmable crops, such as wool, coal, diamond, etc. as well.)  
*Herbivicus*  
Required:Nature Magic (Warcraft)  
Through your abundant connection with life and nature, your communication with plants has fostered into an ability that allows you total control over your crops. When nearby, your control allows you to precisely guide your crop’s growth, dictating the direction in which their magical, medicinal, or nutritional properties lean. You’re even able to completely change an individual plant’s chemical make up over time.  
Additionally, your crops have zero chance to fail, meaning they’re all but inviolate to inside or outside phenomena that would damage them prior to harvesting.  
*Disciple of Shennong*  
Required:Dreams of The Golden Valley  
You are not just a scholar and follower of Shennong but one of his original disciples. Having inherited his teachings and legacy while he was but a mortal before ascension, your personal connections with the man in life have granted you much more of a solid grasp of Shennong's mindset, philosophy, and who he is as a person.  
Now, making the power your own through personal interpretations of The Way; risks of weakening your 'sight' through incorrect alignment of heart and mind with the Divine aspect of Shennong are now gone, with his lessons imparting upon you prodigious knowledge and wisdom of agriculture, architecture, medicine, etc., turning you into a great teacher able to pass on your legacy to the next generation, continuing the cycle.  
Stand proud as you are the inheritor of his legacy and will upon the earth, walking The Way based on his teachings, shaping the world as you go.

Gunhead  
Cost: 20 SP  
You can create, summon, shape, manipulate, and utilize any kind of firearm with perfect skill. Be it primitive, modern, or even futuristic weaponry, each firearm is an extension of your power, seamlessly integrating into your hands as if an inherent part of your being.  
From physical projectiles to liquid-based rounds, and even energy ammunition, you can summon and discharge them all with effortless precision. Without the worry about ever running out of ammunition.  
You can only summon firearms directly into your hands. With your two hands filled, you are unable to summon additional weapons. Instead, you may instantly dismiss a firearm and summon another in its place.  
You can't conjure ammunition or firearms capable of killing omnipotent beings on the get go, but would need considerable time and effort to manifest them (from decades to a century even, depending on how much you use and practise this power)  
*Great Gunsmith*  
Cost: 5 SP  
Required:Gunhead  
Required:Sacred Gear (DxD)  
Thanks to your affinity for firearms, your Sacred Gear mutated, forming a new Longinus. It acts as an automatic forge within your soul, constantly prototyping and experimenting with the creation of new firearms and ammunition based on your own desires, powers, and capabilities.  
This will allow you to incorporate other powers into your bullets so your shots can deliver effects even when limited to touch range, partially removing the range restrictions of your powers.  
You can also summon your firearms in a floating state around your body, which you can telekinetically control with dexterity and precision equal to your own hands. In the beginning, you will be limited by your multitasking and accuracy, but as your expertise grows with the sacred gear, you will slowly develop a new instinctive sense, allowing you to aim and handle a great number of firearms at once.  
As firearms are one of the most recent weapons of humanity, they grant you both anti-human and anti-divine attributes, which gives you disgustingly powerful super-effectiveness against both. This power comes from the divine having no legends or history standing against modern firearms, which makes your weapons a blind spot for the divine while also being one of the most feared weapons made by humanity against their own race. This has no effect on beings that are neither humanoid nor divine in nature.  
At the core of your sacred gear resides a sadistic pink-haired fox girl with a Russian accent. She regards all human activity as filthy, but that doesn't mean she dislikes any of it. She has complete knowledge about every weapon created by modern humanity and is a skilled assassin.  
You can also choose this sacred gear with a sealed being of your choice, or a version that has no personality and only acts as a normal power, giving you access to the knowledge its core contains as you practice and learn.  
As your mastery grows, you can also unlock other modern weapons of war dreamt and designed by humanity with your Balance Breaker, allowing you to become the embodiment of Death, the Destroyer of Worlds.  
*Holy Firearms*  
Required:Holy Light (DxD)  
Your sacred gear gains the capability to produce blessed firearms and ammunition harnessing the Holy Light similarly to the sacred gear Blade Blacksmith, also known as Holy Sword Creation.  
*Demonic Firearms*  
Required:Half-Devil (DxD)  
Your sacred gear gains the capability to produce demonic firearms and ammunition, harnessing your demonic power similarly to the sacred gear Sword Birth, also known as Demonic Sword Creation.  
*Unlimited Gun Works*  
Required:Reality Marble (Type-Moon)  
Your inner world contains a manifestation of the Great Gunsmith, including every firearm and bullet ever produced, including every single prototype and experiment. When your inner world is materialised, your telekinetic control over firearms will know no bounds, encompassing your entire inner world and even affecting your ammunition, giving you unprecedented control and power.

The Emperor Flames (Battle Through The Heavens)  
Cost: 15 SP  
The Heavenly Flames are unique flames originating from the Dou Qi continent, born from the ignited essence of heaven and earth.  
Twenty-three Heavenly Flames are known to exist, each possessing distinct properties, ranging from tremendous destructive power to beneficial effects far surpassing those that cultivators can create.  
Examples include the Bone-Chilling Flame, which burns with extreme cold instead of hot; the Fallen Heart Flame, which passively increases the purity and potency of one's Ki while also being capable of burning the soul of your enemy; and the Life Spirit Flame, which possesses the power of life, granting longevity and accelerating the growth of magical herbs,...etc.  
These properties make them highly coveted by cultivators, especially alchemists seeking to enhance their skills.  
The Emperor Flame is the strongest of the 23, formed by combining the other 22, thereby encompassing all their special properties.  
You have now absorbed and refined the Emperor Flame, hosting it within your body. Although the flame you possess is merely a faint ember, it retains all its special properties, allowing you to manipulate it effortlessly as an extension of yourself.  
By infusing the flame with supernatural energy or allowing it to burn and consume, you can nurture it back to its original, world-incinerating glory and beyond.

*Alchemy Saint Legacy (Battle Through The Heavens)*  
Cost: 5 SP  
Required:Sovereign of Alchemy  
Required:The Emperor Flames (Battle Through The Heavens)  
You have inherited the combined legacies of Xiao Yan and Yao Chen, including everything they acquired throughout their long and storied lives.  
This inheritance includes a vast library of knowledge on alchemy, cultivation, and battle techniques, with the most significant being the Flame Mantra, a cultivation technique that grows stronger in direct proportion to the power of the heavenly flames you possess.  
Moreover, you possess a sixth sense for alchemy, allowing you to instantly identify the properties of any alchemical reagents or magical herbs you encounter, even if you’ve never seen them before. This ability not only helps you understand what can be created with the ingredients at hand but also provides a general idea of how to craft the finished product.  
This unique talent ensures that you can utilise each ingredient to its fullest potential, rapidly advancing your skills as an alchemist.

Sovereign of Poison  
Cost: 15 SP  
Your body has gone through a metamorphosis similar in nature to Kodoku, a method in which someone would mix various insects in order to create the perfect poison. Your body has gone through a similar event as it was turned into a breeding ground for various poisonous creatures and plants. It combined to make the perfect poison. You. Your body has changed, granting you control over the various creatures that play host to your body, including but not limited to various poisonous insects of the highest calibre, such as spiders, poisonous centipedes, and other dangerous insects; plants such as nightshade, water hemlock, white snakeroot, castor bean, oleander, and so much more.

Your body has adapted to and becomes immune to poison. and generates poison in your blood, sweat, and the rest of your body. Patience, How Long Does That Take?  
Cost: 30 SP  
You’ve gained the ability to manipulate Duration and Frequency, two closely related aspects of time.  
Duration allows you to control how long it takes something to occur. This is done by taking the Start and End of an event or activity, and either stretching it out or shrinking it.  
This could allow one to travel across vast stretches of space by shrinking the duration it takes to travel it, shrink the duration it takes you to heal to allow near instantaneous regeneration, shrink the duration it takes for you to recover your energy, and even shrink the duration it takes to accomplish things of a less physical nature such as how long it takes you come up with an idea.  
Likewise you can do the reverse, you can stretch out a moment to give yourself more time to think during battle, stretch the duration it takes your opponent takes to reach you, stretch out how long it takes for them to heal so they could spend a lifetime with near mortal injuries, stretch out how long it takes someone to succumb to injuries to allow a lot more time for someone to get a chance to heal them, you can even stretch out a day to give you far more time to do things without aging oneself, etc.  
The second part of this ability is the ability to control Frequency, how often an occurrence happens within a unit of time.  
This allows you to manipulate how often something repeats in a given unit of time, or in the event of something being a single occurrence to establish a frequency if you so wish.  
What this could allow you to do is alter the frequency of beneficial things to occur more often while diminishing harmful events.

You now have the power to instantly summon and dismiss 100 sentient and intelligent entities that you can seamlessly communicate telepathically with no matter the distance.  
The entities’ collective strength grows as you ascend the hierarchy, reaching its pinnacle at entity 100\. For instance, entity number 10 surpasses entity number 1 in every conceivable way by a factor of 100.  
Initially, you can only summon the number 1 entity, manifesting as twin dire wolves, double the size of an adult male polar bear. Each wolf exhibits ten times the physical strength and speed of an elite Olympic male athlete, has super senses, and with durability capable of easily deflecting concentrated medium-calibre artillery fire. Their claws and teeth are sharp enough to cleave through steel, and they possess the special ability to traverse through shadows, manipulating them at will.  
Each entity boasts unique supernatural abilities, ranging from shadow manipulation, elemental control, to healing, and telekinesis, etc. These special abilities become increasingly potent and fantastical as you ascend the ladder. These entities also exhibit enhanced passive growth, becoming stronger with increased utilization of their abilities.  
To summon higher-level entities, such as entity number 2, you must summon them and defeat them using your own abilities. If you successfully defeat them, you gain control over them, enabling unrestricted summoning. In the event of defeat, the entity will never kill you and will disappear for 24 hours before the process can be initiated again. Each entity that you successfully defeated or was already able to summon like entity number 1, will demonstrate an unwavering and unconditional allegiance in perpetually serving you, this bond can never be broken under no influence, not even your own.  
Free from the need for sustenance and immune to fatigue, these entities, if vanquished, require a 24-hour regeneration period before they can be summoned again at full capacity. Unless dismissed they persistently remain in your service, also they might develop a unique personality of their own, if you so allow it.

666 Evil Eyes (Essence Meta)  
Cost: 20 SP  
You are the bearer of the 666 Evil Eyes, granting supernatural abilities to one of your eyes. The default eye, known as The Blankest Eye of The Great King of Normalcy, allows you to see all things supernatural, pierce illusions, and see through obstacles. Each of the 666 Evil Eyes has a unique name, changing the appearance of your eyes and providing specific powers related to its name.  
Using an Evil Eye other than the default requires effort and cannot be maintained constantly. With practice, you can extend its usage, but you need to return to the default form to rest your eye. These abilities are not fixed; they can grow and change with training and effort, becoming more potent and versatile without limits. Even new Evil Eyes not among the 666 can appear over time.  
To use a specific Evil Eye, you must first attune to it by using it. The more you use it, the stronger the connection becomes, increasing its chances of appearing again during selection until you can use it at will. You also start fully attuned to two randomly selected additional Evil Eyes.  
Among the 666 Evil Eyes, 99 are classified as Supreme Evil Eyes, appearing during extreme emotional stress or near-death experiences. These Eyes are incredibly powerful and can cause world-altering events when unleashed. Using them initially enters you into an unconscious berserker state, and their powers become unpredictable. Learning to control a Supreme Evil Eye's abilities is challenging but possible with great mental discipline and training.  
The power of the Evil Eyes is not tied to the physical form of your eye. If lost, the power transfers to your remaining eye or another body part until the lost eyes are replaced. You can grant copies of fully attuned Evil Eyes to others, instilling loyalty and providing them with similar, albeit weaker, powers initially. You can remove copies of Evil Eyes you've granted at any time.

Hunter of \[Insert Target Here\]  
Cost: 30 SP  
You've become the ultimate Hunter, those who seek to pursue and eliminate specific foes with unwavering determination. By designating a target, the user gains an extraordinary boost in all aspects, as well as abilities tailored specifically to counter and hunt down their chosen adversary.  
Upon selecting their target, the wielder will feel a shift in their physical and mental attributes. Their strength, speed, agility, and intellect all receive a boost, empowering them to hunt their formidable foe. The user's instincts also sharpen to unparalleled levels, enabling them to perceive weaknesses and anticipate the enemy's moves with uncanny precision.  
However, this power requires the user to be near the target to stay active, within a range of 10 kilometres. The potency of the boost depends on the precision and strength of the designated target. Against broad categories like demons or vampires, the enhancement may be moderate, providing a 20-30% increase in abilities and a minor ability to counter the creature. Such as against demons, the user may gain the ability to imbue their touch with holy energy.  
But if the user designates a single, exceptionally powerful individual as their target, their newfound abilities and strength skyrocket. Their power can easily double or triple. Moreover, a suite of specialized abilities to pierce through defenses and exploit vulnerabilities is unlocked. This might encompass the ability to discern and bypass magical barriers, exploit elemental weaknesses, or even adapt in real-time to counter the target's strategies.  
Furthermore, this power grants the user a sixth sense, allowing them to always know the location of their designated target within a range of over 100 kilometers. This unparalleled awareness ensures they can constantly track down and confront their adversary, never losing sight of their pursuit.

### Object of Power

Yata no Kagami  
Cost: 20 SP  
The Yata no Kagami is a bronze mirror sacred to the Shinto faith. Forged long ago by the deity Ishikori-dome, the Mirror represents Truth and aided in luring Amaterasu-Ōmikami from the cave Ama-no-Iwayato and restoring the light of the sun to the world once more.  
The mirror has many abilities, Firstly it has the ability to be worn as a shield, and reflect back all attacks that target it, whether they be magical, physical, or spiritual.  
Secondly though easiest with mirrors it is capable of displaying the surroundings of any other reflective surface. Through this one may spy or communicate as you see fit.  
Thirdly the mirror only reflects Truth therefore disguise and deception are rendered impossible to all but the user while one is reflected within it.  
Fourthly the mirror is capable of manipulating light to create illusions, though only a clever user can find many uses for this.  
Fifthly as a relic of the Sun Goddess in the hands of a solar deity or demigod the mirror is capable of shrouding itself in solar flame and temporarily acting as the sun.  
Lastly the user may change the size and form of the mirror to suit their needs, though the end result will always be reflective like a mirror, and clearly made of bronze.  
*Chrysanthemum Throne*  
Required:Kusanagi no Tsurugi  
Required:Yasakani Magatama  
You have gained the Sword of Valor Kusanagi no Tsurugi, the Jewel of Benevolence Yasakani Magatama and the Mirror of Truth Yata no Kagami, these three legendary relics are known as the Imperial Regalia of Japan, now as their new owner you receive the power’s rights and privileges of being the Emperor of Japan (or it’s analogues) in any world you enter.

As the Emperor you can be the absolute ruler of Japan, with a loyal and obedient government to enact your will on an adoring populace, or be instead a figurehead with that same government governing your people in any way you desire. At your whim you can change which of these choices, with your subjects happy to comply.

While you do have a newfound talent for governing and leadership, you also serve the role of Head of the Shinto faith. Even in worlds where there are no gods, this brings immense levels of loyalty and respect from the faithful, while in worlds where the Shinto Gods exist? You serve as the direct link to the Kami, able to communicate humanities desires and barter for divine favour and intervention.  
*Legacy of the Sun*  
Required:Kusanagi no Tsurugi  
Required:Yasakani Magatama  
Required:Demigod (Percy Jackson)  
While normally a designation more commonly found in the Greco-Roman Pantheon, you now stand as a Legacy of the Shinto Sun Goddess Amaterasu-Ōmikami. While your connection to her is diluted by many generations you are an anomaly that has managed to gain a more powerful connection to her domains of Sun and Light enough to be considered equal to a demigod.  
From the Domain of the Sun you can generate and control Solar Flames, are empowered while the sun is in the sky, and and have a limited ability to control gravity  
While the Domain of Light allows you to generate and manipulate light, from simply illuminating a dark space, to illusions of light, and even constructs of hard light, the variety of uses serving you well.

Yasakani Magatama  
Cost: 20 SP  
This teardrop shaped piece of red agate is the Yasakani Magatama one of the many such pieces created to lure the Sun Goddess Amaterasu-Ōmikami from the Cave Ama-no-Iwato and return the light of the sun to the world. This particular Magatama is the only one to have made its way into human hands, and represents Benevolence.

The Magatama possesses several useful abilities. First is the power to store and convert power, from Magic, to Ki, Reiryoku to Chakra, this gem can store an unlimited amount of power sources for use at a later date, while allowing the user to convert between different power sources at will.  
Secondly is the ability to store spells and techniques, to be cast from the Magatama’s stored reserves of power, allowing even those without such powers to cast such techniques if needed.  
Thirdly is the ability to allow the user to interact with the spiritual, allowing one to perceive and if need be fight, ghosts and spirits of all kinds.  
Fourthly is the ability for the user to always be considered aligned to “Holy” or “Good” as suits their needs, allowing one to use abilities and items restricted to those with said traits.  
Finally the Magatama allows the wielder to use the weapons and relics of the Gods as if they were the God in question, though this only gives the ability to use the item, but not necessarily the ability to control or survive the effects.  
Kusanagi no Tsurugi  
Cost: 15 SP  
Also known as the Ame-no-Murakumo-no-Tsurugi, this is the sword that represents Valor. The sword was pulled from the corpse of the dreaded dragon Yamata-no-Orochi by Susanoo-no-Mikoto and gifted to Amaterasu-Ōmikami.

This sword has many powers, first among them is the ability for the user to control the wind itself, utilizing it as cutting blades, powerful blasts, or even more subtle manipulations such as redirecting an existing fire.  
Secondly is the power of the sword’s connection to its origin, the Yamata-no-Orochi. The blade is capable of delivering any poison or venom the user can think of, and rendering said poison uncurable if desired. The sword defaults to the Japanese alcohol, sake, used to render the Yamata-no-Orochi into a drunken stupor, which in turn can make its victim also fall into the same state as the legendary serpent, it is though also capable of replicating the Yamata-no-Orochi’s much more lethal Venom if desired.

Thirdly the blade is capable of ‘breathing’ fire like its origin, by wreathing the blade in flames or emitting it as waves & blasts of flame.  
Fourthly the sword is capable of changing its blade into the eight heads of the Yamata-no-Orochi, to strike at the wielder’s foes.  
Fifthly as a sword that belonged to the God of Storms, and the Goddess of the Sun, when wielded by a deity or demigod with either of those domains the sword can manipulate the weather.  
Lastly, as a treasured relic of mythology, the Kusanagi-no-Tsurugi bears a powerful Holy Aura that monsters and demons instinctively fear.

House of Horror  
Cost: 10 SP  
Welcome to the House of Horror, an eerie and thrilling haunted theme park that materializes wherever you desire, seamlessly blending into its surroundings as if it has always been a part of the landscape. Step into a realm of spine-chilling attractions and macabre delights, where the line between the living and the dead blurs into a chilling dance of the supernatural.  
As the proprietor of this dark spectacle, you wield the power to shape the House of Horror according to your twisted imagination. Every detail, from the rides to the layout and decorations, is under your command. The park comes alive with a sinister energy, its atmosphere tinged with anticipation and a hint of malevolence.  
However, what sets the House of Horror apart is its staff, who are not your ordinary park employees. Instead, they consist of ghostly entities, ethereal yokai, animated corpses, and other macabre beings. Bound to the park itself, these otherworldly beings feed off the fear of guests to grow. As employees they are dedicated to the maintenance, financial aspects, and overall operation. They possess an uncanny knowledge of the park's secrets and are ever vigilant in ensuring its dark wonders continue to captivate visitors.  
But beware, for those who meet their demise within the House of Horror become eternally linked to its spectral realm. Their souls become bound to the park, forever trapped in this macabre paradise. As part of the park's staff, they assist in creating a truly immersive and terrifying experience for all who dare to venture within its haunted halls.  
With the House of Horror at your command, you can unleash your darkest fantasies and create an otherworldly haven of frightful entertainment. This haunted theme park is yours to command. And with an unseen Benefactor handling all legal matters, you can focus solely on embracing the eerie delights of the House of Horror.

The Great Library of Alexandria  
Cost: 10 SP  
You now possess a vast library that holds every book (from past to present) from every universe you’ve ever visited. This grand collection contains knowledge from the mundane to the arcane, from the scientific to the metaphysical. From the outside, the Library is a small, unassuming building, with the inside being massively bigger than the outside. You can choose where the library is spawned.  
Be careful when reading books in the library, as some books contain dangerous information—memetic hazards that could alter your mind or reality itself, depending on the rules of the world they are from. Luckily, as long as it’s on the shelf the books cannot affect you.  
The older tomes, some that the original has long since been destroyed due to age, are fragile, some held together by brittle bindings that could crumble with a touch. While the library is enchanted with basic preservation magic to prevent decay and maintain order, it is far from foolproof. The magic does not protect against mishandling or the more volatile properties of certain books, so caution is needed.  
Additionally, while the library offers unparalleled access to multiversal knowledge, it lacks a universal translation feature. You must decipher texts in their original languages, and some may require unique methods of interpretation—whether through spells, advanced technology, or ancient rituals—further complicating your pursuit of knowledge. In essence, this library is a treasure trove of wisdom, but it demands both respect and caution from those who would unlock its secrets.  
   
The Explorer's Archway  
Cost: 25 SP  
The Explorer's Archway is a doorway crafted uniquely for your style and aesthetic. When not in use, it transforms into a small drawing of a door you can easily carry. Placing this drawing against any surface restores it to its full size. Stepping through the Archway takes you into an endless pocket dimension filled with islands.  
Each island has its own theme, reflecting the location it connects to on the other side. On each island, a door awaits, allowing you to teleport to different places across the Omniverse. While you can only visit a new universe once per year, you may return to any universe you’ve previously visited at any time. Within any universe, you can travel freely, using these doors to jump from one destination to another. You also have an instinctive sense that guides you to the right island for any place you wish to go.  
Beside each door lies an Adventurer’s Board—a magical guide attuned to each island’s locale. The Board lists exciting activities, quests, and skills to master, constantly updating with fresh insights gathered as you explore. It also provides detailed information about the universe or planet beyond each door, including valuable tips for explorers. The Board even recommends local food and drink options tailored to your tastes and dietary needs.

Completing notable quests or witnessing amazing sights listed on the Board has a unique effect. Every achievement enriches the island linked to that location. For instance, if you save a tropical world, its island may gain lush fruits or mimic its climate. The more you explore, accomplish quests, and uncover wonders, the more vibrant your islands become, with flourishing wildlife, plants, and architectural marvels. While you can’t control exactly what features each island will gain, they’ll never be harmful or life-threatening.  
Exclusively designed for your exploration and enjoyment, the Explorer’s Archway can only be used by you or those you expressly permit, making it the perfect hub for your adventures.  
*The Explorer's Spirit*  
Required:Universal Aptitude  
With your ability to learn every skill to a novice degree, The Explorer's Archway will match that zest with zeal and automatically adjust your body to match, giving you the basic body and ability of any native of the Universe when you walk through that Universe's door. But the best part? It's permanent\!

Dimensional Cage  
Cost: 35 SP  
Created by an advanced civilization to stop beings from Beyond the Veil/Stars, the original Reality Stabilizer required construction around a star to harness its power and protected an entire solar system. However, your version is a simplified and less potent model, capable of protecting only a single planet but only requires a fraction of the energy and can function for several centuries before its internal generators need refueling.  
The Dimensional Cage takes the form of a sleek, black icosahedron measuring 1 x 1 x 1 meters. Despite its compact size, it contains highly advanced machinery within a space that is larger on the inside. Once powered, the anchor projects a barrier around the planet, invisible to most except those able to perceive metaphysical or higher-dimensional phenomena. The barrier’s primary function is to tether the planet’s metaphysical space to a set of predefined rules, stabilizing reality and preventing harmful external forces from entering or altering it.

While the barrier allows most natural events and entities to pass through freely, it blocks anything classified as “harmful” by the system’s parameters. These threats include: Interdimensional beings; Reality-warping phenomena (e.g., spatial tears, time distortions, Quantum Stuff,); Certain types of metaphysical or esoteric energy; Any forces or entities that have been manually added to the Blacklist by the user;  
The Blacklist feature lets you define what the barrier considers harmful. You can customize the parameters to allow specific entities or energies to bypass the defense. For example, allied magic-based attacks could be permitted while hostile reality-warpers or dimensional invaders are completely blocked.  
Despite the Dimensional Cage robust metaphysical tethering mechanism, extreme or sudden surges in universal phenomena can cause temporary glitches. These disruptions may result in portions of the barrier weakening or malfunctioning, creating gaps through which certain phenomena could slip before the system stabilizes again. While these glitches are usually self-correcting, they can cause brief periods of vulnerability. Notable phenomena that can cause such disruptions include: The spontaneous and sudden existence of a new supernatural energy source near or inside the barrier; A Big Rip (a hypothetical cosmological event); Collision with another universe; The corpse of a GOD falling through your comparatively fragile 4D reality;  
Note: To work, the Cage needs to be on the same reality as the planet, thus being put in any type of space, time, dimension not in the same place as the planet, will instead protect it and not the planet.  
*Eldritch Drive Module*  
Required:Necronomicon (Cthulhu Tech)  
The cage is enhanced with psychic shielding derived from eldritch technologies. These psychic-infused barriers can repel both physical threats and attacks on the metaphysical plane, including mental intrusions, psychic projections, and eldritch horrors from beyond the veil. The eldritch properties of the shield make it particularly resistant to cosmic entities and dark gods, providing a versatile and nearly impenetrable defense. Any eldritch beings or reality-warpers attempting to breach the cage will face overwhelming psychic feedback, disrupting their very existence.  
The module also upgrades the tethering mechanism with a Dimensional Feedback Network (DFN). This network feeds real-time data on cosmic disturbances, eldritch anomalies, and dimensional shifts into the system, enabling faster and more adaptive responses to breaches or potential threats.  
A Dimensional Drive (D-Drive) is incorporated, serving as a secondary power source. Drawing energy from ambient arcane forces and higher-dimensional planes, the D-Drive ensures the cage remains operational even if its primary generators are damaged or depleted. This reduces strain on the plants powering the cage and extends its longevity, potentially sustaining it for millennia. Additionally, the D-Drive allows for rapid stabilization after glitches or breaches, ensuring instant repairs in the face of cosmic phenomena.  
The Blacklist feature is upgraded with Psychic Modulation, granting the user the ability to telepathically adjust the barrier’s parameters in real time. Moreover, this link enhances the user’s psychic abilities, channeling leftover computational power and excess energy to strengthen their mental prowess.  
*Leyline Eldritch Resonance*  
Required:Irminsul (Genshin Impact)  
With the addition of the Irminsul Seedling, the Dimensional Cage forms a symbiotic connection with the leyline network created by the world tree’s roots. This connection enhances the cage’s planetary protection, fortifying it with Irminsul’s natural energy flow and the knowledge absorbed from the world. The roots entwine with the Dimensional Cage's tethering system, stabilizing reality on a deeper metaphysical level.  
By tapping into the elemental energy circulating through the Irminsul-enhanced leyline network, the barrier is strengthened against reality-warping forces. This enhancement allows the cage to better resist dimensional rifts, cosmic disturbances, and energy-based attacks. The natural flow of energy also makes the barrier more fluid and adaptive to external fluctuations, minimizing glitches or vulnerabilities caused by cosmic forces.  
The Blacklist feature benefits from Irminsul’s knowledge of hazardous energies and forbidden information, particularly in combating eldritch forces. While integrating chaotic data into the tree’s system can cause anomalies, the Dimensional Cage gains improved pre-emptive filtering to prevent immediate destabilization. Over time, both Irminsul and the cage adapt to these chaotic energies, increasing their resilience.  
Disruptions or breaches caused by extreme cosmic events can now be automatically repaired through leyline resonance. Irminsul’s roots draw energy from the planet to heal the Dimensional Cage, closing any gaps in protection swiftly. As the leyline system becomes more established, repairs become faster and more efficient.  
For optimal effect, the Dimensional Cage and Irminsul must coexist within the same dimensional reality. The natural flow of energy and information between the two ensures the planet remains secure, even under intense cosmic stress. While dangerous knowledge or chaotic energies may still cause anomalies, the combined power of the tree and the cage contains these disruptions more effectively.  
*Database of Broken Destinies*  
Required:Broken Tablet of Fate (Forgotten Realms)  
The Tablet enhances the Dimensional Cage with the ability to shield the planet not only from physical and dimensional threats but also from cosmic prophecy and fate manipulation. With the tablet fragment embedded, future outcomes, divine schemes, and predestined events involving the planet or its inhabitants are obscured from the sight of gods, fate-weavers, and other entities capable of manipulating destiny. This renders the planet’s fate entirely undetectable and impervious to outside interference.  
The tablet’s ancient knowledge of Gods and Primordials further attunes the Dimensional Cage to cosmic forces. It can now recognize and categorize interdimensional or divine entities with greater precision, offering enhanced protection against Primordial Forces and Eldritch Invaders. Additionally, the Cage can provide insights into these beings’ nature, allowing for more tailored defenses based on their unique attributes.  
The Fragment of Fate also grants the Dimensional Cage a Reality Override feature, enabling it to alter small but critical aspects of fate within its protective field. For example, certain outcomes tied to Prophecy or Cosmic Balance can be temporarily suspended, granting the planet’s inhabitants greater control over their destinies. However, the more significant the override, the more energy and focus the Cage must expend to stabilize reality afterward.  
A new feature, Temporal Stasis, is imbued by the tablet fragment. When faced with severe cosmic disturbances or catastrophic breaches, such as the corpse of a GOD or a universe collision, the Cage can temporarily halt time within its barrier. This stasis effect freezes the affected area, preventing further damage and allowing repairs to proceed without further deterioration, thus ensuring reality remains intact during moments of crisis.  
Finally, the tablet fragment offers a boon to sentient beings. As its holder, you can access its latent potential through the Dimensional Cage, or allow its influence to permeate the planet. This could lead to profound insights into ancient cosmic laws or the evolution of abilities based on divine and primordial powers. However, unlocking this potential requires study, experimentation, and possibly collaboration with other powerful entities.

Meta-verse Controller  
Cost: 40 SP  
This sophisticated wrist-mounted computer boasts advanced technology, offering the flexibility for users to customize its appearance according to their preferences. The device is designed with a neural interface, facilitating seamless interaction with all its functions and features. It serves two primary purposes.  
Firstly, it functions as a tool for traversing the meta-multiverse. Users write or declare the desired world and timeline for their visit. Once in the chosen world, they are restricted from leaving for a year. The method of travel can be tailored to the user's preference, whether it involves a journey from their current world to the new one or instantaneous transportation.  
As its secondary function, the device grants access to a private world. Within this realm, individuals have the liberty to modify rules as per their liking. Time stands still, and inhabitants do not age or suffer from health issues. The user's soul is tethered to a beacon in this world, ensuring their revival upon death, albeit with the need to reconstruct their bodies, a straightforward process. The private world remains concealed, and anyone or anything entering must adhere to the user's rules unless they wield greater power.  
Moreover, the device is designed to evolve over time, introducing additional functions and features for its users.

A.I. Chip  
Cost: 10 SP  
The A.I. Chip is an advanced Biological Assistance Microchip designed to integrate seamlessly with the user's brain. Originally a vital tool for scientists from a advanced distant world, it functions primarily as a material device for data storage and analysis. Your chip has evolved into a highly versatile asset, now residing in your soul and gaining new capabilities.  
The A.I. Chip provides several essential features to its user:

Data Storage: The chip records and stores the user's experiences, creating a comprehensive database from sensory input.  
Data Analysis: It processes simulations and draws deductions from the information stored.  
Language Translation: By leveraging its data analysis and storage functions, the chip can translate and comprehend unknown languages.  
Skill Enhancement: The A.I. assists in refining techniques—both supernatural and mundane—by offering real-time feedback and suggestions.  
Power Tracking: It monitors the user’s supernatural energy, vital signs, and those of nearby individuals, alerting the user to potential dangers or opportunities for growth.  
Upgrades and Energy Source: The chip draws energy from yourself and the surrounding atmosphere to power itself and enable future upgrades.

Nexus Arcanum  
Cost: 15 SP  
You have found yourself soulbound to the Nexus Arcanum, a magical focus of the highest degree. In its true form you will find that the Nexus Arcanum takes the shape of a perfectly fitting indestructible palm-sized orb that alternatively takes the shape of a ring of your own design. Alongside the Nexus Arcanum you will find a source of magic within yourself that grows with use and is directed by your intent. At any instant you are able to recall your focus to your hand, additionally your focus can be stored inside and summoned from your magic source with a moment of concentration.  
As a novice wizard beginning to embark on your journey, the Nexus Arcanum starts off as a basic magical focus with no enchantments. However, as you grow in knowledge and power, you will have the opportunity to layer and weave new enchantments onto the surface of its true form, the orb. Each enchantment should be carefully chosen to serve a specific magical purpose or theme, such as enhancing elemental spells, amplifying telekinetic abilities, or delving into the realm of rituals. Spells can be cast through the focus without any enchantments, although they will be lacking in magnitude compared to spells enhanced by numerous enchantments.  
With each enchantment added, the Nexus Arcanum gains more depth and potential, becoming a repository of magical knowledge and abilities. However, the true marvel lies in the Nexus Arcanum’s capacity to reach a critical point in its development, where it can perform a remarkable feat: condensing all the enchantments on the object's surface into a single, minuscule grain.  
As the enchantments merge and condense, the magical energy within the Nexus Arcanum intensifies exponentially, amplifying the potency of the enchantments manifold. The single grain becomes the base of the object, serving as the core of the Nexus Arcanum's ever-evolving magic.  
You can then begin the process anew, enchanting the surface with a different theme, layering more magic, and, once again, achieving the critical point where the enchantments converge into a new, condensed grain of power. This cycle of enchanting, condensing, and amplifying can continue ad infinitum, allowing the Nexus Arcanum to grow in potency and diversity with each iteration.  
   
The Spark of Defiance; Humanity's Last Outpost  
Cost: 30 SP  
You have acquired the ultimate war machine and the last hope of humanity, the T.S.O.D. This colossal mobile fortress was built to withstand and fight against a relentless horde of self-replicating machines that nearly wiped out all life on Earth. The T.S.O.D is a marvel of engineering, technology, and defiance, and it is now yours to command.

The T.S.O.D is composed of hyper-advanced smart matter, which can regenerate, adapt, and even reshape it's form in seconds, allowing it to traverse any terrain and environment, even the vacuum of space thanks to its anti-gravity propulsion and internal teleportation array. It can also deploy various defensive and offensive measures, such as energy shields, plasma cannons, missile launchers, railguns, and more.  
Within the T.S.O.D lies something called the Alchemical Forge, a singularity engine connected to a higher dimensional plane of energy which allows for infinite energy generation, and through it's inner manufactory, convert energy to matter, allowing for the non-stop production of small and heavy arms, autonomous assets, weaponry, vehicles, armor, mechs, and more without pause. This was what allowed the final remnant of humanity to stand against, and even temporarily overwhelmed the self replicating nature of their enemies, nonetheless, it was all for naught.  
The T.S.O.D also acted as humanity's Ark, with an archive of patterns to construct a second outpost, terraform the land, artificially grow life, create farms, and so forth—all the things needed to rebuild from scratch if humanity had managed to win the war against the machines. While the internal construction yards, and matter fabricators are the primary means of production, your assets can be deployed out of the T.S.O.D to allow for independent construction and material collection, aided by harvester drones, assembly/disassembly arrays, and other manufacturing automata.  
Within the core of the Alchemical forge lies two incredibly powerful AI's which act as the administrator of all the T.S.O.D systems, and as the assistant to the Outpost leader. Through the multi-dimensional nature of the Alchemical Forge, the physical components of the AI's are housed within a quasi-stable pocket dimension wherein the physical laws of realspace don't quite apply. This enables for physical components and computational speeds vastly beyond normal limits of physics, vastly enhancing the AI's research and combat modeling capabilities, allowing it to rapidly adapt to any enemy or adversity, and even simulate and predict the movement and plan of its enemies years, if not decades in advance.  
The T.S.O.D is also linked to your mind via a neural web, which allows you to monitor, command, and control it from anywhere. You can communicate with the AIs, access any information, or activate any function with just a thought.

The T.S.O.D is a one-of-a-kind item that cannot be duplicated or replicated by any means. It is also immune to any form of hacking, jamming, or interference from external sources. However, it is not invincible; it can still be damaged or destroyed by sufficiently powerful attacks or forces. If the T.S.O.D is ever fully destroyed, you will be able to materialize it's core, which will begin to regenerate itself after a period of time.  
Note: if you have one or more Technology And Artifice Powers, then the T.S.O.D will automatically gain the ability to manufacture anything from the referred setting or settings. From mystical metals and fantastical creatures, to futuristic mechs and weapons of war from alien races, everything is within the T.S.O.D grasp.

Sacred Fig Of Enlightenment  
Cost: 25 SP  
You now own a seed that once planted into the ground will rapidly grow into the Sacred Fig Of Enlightenment. During the day the tree radiates with the golden light of comprehension which enhances the ability to learn and master skills of all who bask in its glow by a hundredfold while at night it glows with the silver glow of inspiration giving all that the light shines upon new creative ideas, epiphany and inspiration to overcome whatever challenges they may have.

The leaves of the tree when brewed into tea and consumed can soothe broken psyches and alleviate spiritual ailment and corruption, The tea is capable of permanently curing such affliction with repeated consumption over time from day to month depending on the severity of the afflicted.  
Once every year or month if provided with enough supernatural energy the tree will flower and bear fruit, eating the fruit produced by the tree will grant one a permanent increase in mental and spiritual faculty alongside a deeper insight into both oneself and the functioning of the infinite cosmos.  
If you wish to relocate the tree you can simply transform it back into a seed to carry with you wherever you go  
Immortal Slaying Godbow Sun Feller  
Cost: 20 SP  
The Legendary Bow of the Immortal Hou Yi, renowned for its role in downing nine golden sun crows from the sky, leaving one to illuminate the heavens and earth, stands as a godly weapon capable of slaying immortals and gods alike.

Following this remarkable feat, the bow underwent further enhancement through the power of the nine fallen golden sun crows. Each crow infused it with the power of a mystical sun. When drawn, the bow requires no physical arrows; instead, it conjures an arrow of Sunfire. Moreover, the bow offers several firing modes for the wielder:

Multi-shot: Upon drawing, multiple arrows resembling flaming feathers materialize around the user, allowing them to rain down hundreds, if not thousands, of arrows simultaneously, dealing fiery destruction to adversaries.  
Tracking shot: The arrow takes on the form of a three-legged golden sun crow mid-flight, relentlessly pursuing its target to ensure a precise strike.  
Charge shot: The arrow's power intensifies as the bow is drawn and held. Upon release, its force can penetrate any defense, cleanly piercing the target or causing a devastating explosion that turns surrounding matter into molten slag.

As an immortal weapon, those lacking divine strength will struggle to unleash its full potential. A novice wielder might only manage to unleash enough power to demolish a city block with a single shot. However, with practice, one can unlock more of its true capabilities.  
Individuals possessing powers related to the sun or solar energy will find it easier to harness the bow's full potential. Even after unlocking its full power, the bow remains an extraordinary conduit for channeling solar abilities, akin to Mjolnir's relationship with Thor.  
*The Perfect Shot*  
Required:Solar Exalted (Exalted)  
Required:Dimensional Projection  
Your ability to reach beyond space and time, combined with your power of excellence as a Solar Exalted, has imbued the arrow of Sunfeller with the ability to unfailingly hit its target. Regardless of the target's location or the protection it may have, your arrow will absolutely find its mark.  
Whether your opponent attempts to hide in another dimension, travel through time, seal themselves in an indestructible room, or employ an Exalted charm for perfect defense, etc., the arrow will unerringly hit its mark under any circumstance.  
As long as you can perceive your opponent and release the arrow, there is no escape or defense against its impact.
