Required:Immortal Sun  
Required:Immortal Physiques: Yang (Emperor's Domination)  
Required:Sunshine (The Seven Deadly Sins)  
The various solar-related powers that you wield have supercharged the power of the bow, not only granting you access to its full potential from the outset but also exponentially boosting its power.  
This mastery also enables you to manipulate how the bow utilizes solar energy, granting you the ability to combine multiple firing modes into one or even create an entirely new mode.  
The might of its arrow can now incinerate its target on an abstract and conceptual level, essentially burning your target from existence upon impact.  
*Wrath Of The Most High*  
Required:Solar Exalted (Exalted)  
Required:Incarna (Exalted)  
Your might as a celestial Incarna of the sun has resonated with the god bow, transforming it into one of your divine symbols, thus making it a weapon on par with the god spear of all searing noon.  
The bow now deals infinite damage to all targets it hits, annihilating even the most indestructible of foes with absolute ease. Resisting or being immune to light, heat, fire, and the like would do nothing before the boundless might of your bow.

Perfect Phone  
Cost: 18 SP  
This phone is no ordinary phone; it has an infinite battery life, infinite memory storage, free wifi connection to any universes if you end up in a universe that has it. If not, it can connect to the internet of neighboring universes. It is connected to your soul and cannot be stolen from you, should it be destroyed you can simply unsummon and resummon it, completely repaired. The appearance of the phone will change to any kind of design you would prefer as long as it's conceivably be considered a phone that can be held and used by you.  
But that is not all, this phone is the Perfect Phone you could ever have or ever need. It gains apps and enhancements to current apps that are based on your own abilities, magics, skills or the situation of the world you're in. For example, it will as default have a planetary map and GPS of whatever world you're on allowing you to know where you and all points of interests would be. If you were to have a gamer power it would gain an app to allow you to see your stats and manipulate your system , if you were to have homecoming or some teleportation power your map would update to allow you to use it as both an enhancer and waypoint feature for your power to allow longer reach and more precise teleportation. If you have magic you'll get an app filled with all the spells your magic could conceivably know and step by step guides on how to learn to and do them. If you're a craftsman you will get an app with how-to videos on new recipes or ways to learn how to enhance your craft while also having your map update to show good nodes or ingredients you can either farm in the wild or shops that sell them.  
The true unique power of this phone is that it allows you to call anyone, period. Whether they are across the universe, dead, in a completely different universe, an alternate version of them, asleep, sealed, or not even having a phone. They will be forced to pick up the phone call, a video call, or see your texts in some way either by a magical screen showing in front of them or as a thought in their head. This does not force them to do what you say or make them unable to "hang up" but it does make sure they have to answer the call.  
You do not have to worry about your brain spontaneously melting from hearing or speaking to Eldritch beings while on the phone or worry about them tracking your location across the omniverse to get you as this Phone comes with state of the art reality warping VPN and Firewall protection.  
This phone can both integrate other magics, technologies, and abilities of a similar phone type or something that could become an app, and over time all your apps will naturally grow and change to best suit you.  
*Inner Phone*  
Required: Inner Beast, MUSE  
This phone wasn’t just something you stumbled upon; it was something the beast within you designed specifically for you. All your apps now operate with significantly higher efficiency than ever before. The planetary map doesn’t just display points of interest; it also reveals everything from various lifeforms and small villages to the names and locations of forests, rivers, and even hidden treasures.  
Having Homecoming will fill your phone with an extensive media library and catalog while also granting the phone the ability to open portals, allowing you to explore the vast multiverse. Magic apps go beyond simple step-by-step guides, offering detailed insights into every spell you could potentially learn. They also work to craft entirely new spells and abilities, while also enabling your phone to generate mana that can be used to replenish your reserves or as an independent power source, much like a wand.  
The Inner Beast or MUSE can also be an advanced AI integrated into your phone. It manages existing apps with remarkable speed and even creates new ones tailored to your needs, ensuring you’re always prepared for whatever challenges come your way.  
*Apple*  
Required:Magitech  
You know now how to forge such phones with all it’s benefits for either yourself or others.  
   
Perfect Companion

Introducing the Perfect Companion\! This loyal companion is uniquely connected to your soul and can take the form of almost anything you desire—a robot, an android, a bird, a floating orb, a human, an elf, or even a cube with a heart at its center, their form is not static and can be changed by you with a thought or by the companion to be something pleasing to you. Basic Supernatural Guide  
Cost: 5 SP  
You have now gained a book filled with knowledge about most supernatural creatures or effects. You may choose the basic design of this book with it always appearing that size no matter how much information it contains. This guide will also contain an index, which allows you to quickly and immediately access the recorded information.  
Every creature recorded in this guide contains a basic description, a basic drawing of them, while also covering tips on identifying and counteracting them, with more common creatures providing more detailed descriptions. This book also contains basic knowledge of general magical or supernatural effects, with a focus on basic ways to spot them and basic ways to counteract them. If you are some kind of supernatural creature, then it will also contain in-depth knowledge of your species relative to the universe you are in. Using your own knowledge, you can also manually add to the book.  
Note: This does not contain any knowledge on how to actually cast magical effects or counteract them through magic.  
*Basic Magical Compendium*  
Required:Grimoire  
Through your grimoire, your Basic Supernatural Guide has now been granted more knowledge of magical effects. This upgrade specifically contains information on how your chosen magic systems can counteract the supernatural effects listed in the guide. This knowledge also has now evolved to contain any magical effect that any of your magic systems canonically have knowledge on a way to cause.  
*An Occultists Guide*  
Required:Occult  
Through your connection to the occult and your occultic knowledge, your guide has evolved. Your guide now contains a treasure trove of occultic rituals, specifically occultic rituals meant to protect people, harm or contain supernatural creatures, or remove curses or other negative supernatural effects. Your guide now also contains knowledge on how to summon certain supernatural creatures and how to contain them. Lastly, your guide now contains information on how to harvest parts of supernatural creatures, which parts are the most useful, and knowledge of the basic ways to use the parts.   
Alongside this increase in information for your guide, you have also been granted a refilling supply of magically conductive chalk for use in rituals. This chalk will naturally increase the stability of any ritual it is used in while also making setting up a ritual circle far easier and quicker, but it's more effective for lower-level rituals compared to higher-level ones. This chalk circle can optionally be used up in the ritual, so you don't have to clean it up.  
*Evolving Guide*  
Required:Journal  
Your Basic Supernatural Guide has now combined with your journal, with it also gaining new abilities. Its new and most important ability is to catalog the basic information of any supernatural creature you have contact with, even if you yourself have no information on them. Secondly, the basic description of supernatural creatures or effects has now naturally been expanded to include more information than it did before. Lastly, any supernatural knowledge contained in this guide will be expanded and contain more information the more you encounter it. The only requirement these abilities have is that they require that knowledge to be available somewhere in that world. 

Journal

Grimoire  
Cost: 10 SP  
A book based around teaching the practice of a magic system to beginners. Which magic system? Well, that's up to you, but it has to be one that can be learned by anyone, although rituals or tools being required to use the magic system work as well so long as their creation or use are taught in the Grimoire. This could take the form of a Wizard's spellbook or an Archivist's prayerbook from D\&D, Gwen's Spellbook from Ben 10, or an Encantus from Doofquest, just for some examples. This spellbook very well could act as a focus or be enchanted in some minor ways such as shifting into pocket size and back, but not an actual magical artifact into itself.
